name: 1-Up
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a monster(s) on your field is destroyed by an opponent's attack or their card effect.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 1 Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: 300 Light-Year Red Cloak
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 3 face-up Reptile Type monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
All face-up Reptile Type monsters on your field gain 300 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if your opponent's LP are at least 3000 higher than yours, you can destroy 1 face-up Normal Monster on your opponent's field.

name: 7 Chance
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's Level 7 or higher monster declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
Draw 3 cards and show them. Then, if there are 2 or more Level 7 monsters among them, gain LP equal to [the number of those Level 7 monsters] x 1500.

name: Abare Ushioni (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Toss a coin. If the result is heads, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. If the result is tails, you take 1000 damage.

name: Abyss Flash
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have 5 or more Sea Serpent Type monsters in your Graveyard, shuffle all monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Change the battle positions of all monsters on your opponent's field (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position).

name: Abyss Gash
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a card is returned from either Graveyard to the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Sea Serpent Type monster on your field gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Abyss Soldier (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 WATER Attribute monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Return 1 card from the field to the hand.

name: Abyssal Dragon Lord Abyss Poseidra
lore:
You can Maximum Summon this card together with "Abyssal Dragon Lord Abyss Poseidra [L]" and "Abyssal Dragon Lord Abyss Poseidra [R]".

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
If you have no monsters in your Graveyard, your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards when this card declares an attack, also if this card is in Maximum Mode, it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

name: Abyssal Dragon Lord Abyss Poseidra [L]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have 5 or more Sea Serpent Type monsters in your Graveyard, place all monsters from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck in any order.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field. Then, if this card is in Maximum Mode and you shuffled 3 or more Maximum Monsters into the Deck to meet the requirement, you can destroy all cards on your opponent's field.

name: Abyssal Dragon Lord Abyss Poseidra [R]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
If you have no monsters in your Graveyard, your opponent cannot Set monsters from the hand, also if this card is in Maximum Mode and your opponent has a face-down Spell/Trap Card on their field, your opponent cannot Set Spell/Trap Cards from the hand.

name: Abyssal Sea Dragon Abyss Kraken
lore:
You can Maximum Summon this card together with "Abyssal Sea Dragon Abyss Kraken [L]" and "Abyssal Sea Dragon Abyss Kraken [R]".

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
If you have no monsters in your Graveyard, this card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects, also if this card is in Maximum Mode, your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards when it declares an attack.

name: Abyssal Sea Dragon Abyss Kraken [L]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle up to 5 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses ATK/DEF equal to [the number of monsters shuffled into the Deck to meet the requirement] x 300 until the end of this turn. Then, if this card is in Maximum Mode and you have no monsters in your Graveyard, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Abyssal Sea Dragon Abyss Kraken [R]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change the battle position of 1 monster on your opponent's field. Then, if this card is in Maximum Mode, this card inflicts piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference), if it attacks a Defense Position monster this turn.

name: Abysskite Ange
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Sea Serpent Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, you can add 1 Level 10 Sea Serpent Type monster with 2500 ATK or "Abysskite Ultimail" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Abysskite Karen
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 LIGHT Attribute monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can add 1 Level 10 Sea Serpent Type monster with 2200 ATK or "Abysskite Protection" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Abysskite Liem
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 monster with 0 DEF from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle up to 3 monsters from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck. Then, you can add 1 Level 10 Sea Serpent Type monster with 2400 ATK or "Abysskite Prevent Wall" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Abysskite Prevent Wall
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your face-up Sea Serpent Type monster.
[EFFECT]
The attack target cannot be destroyed by that battle. Then, if the attack target is in Maximum Mode, you gain 1000 LP.

name: Abysskite Protection
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a Level 5 or higher monster face-up.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Sea Serpent Type monster on your field gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if that monster is a Maximum Monster, it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects this turn.

name: Abysskite Ultimail
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a card is sent to your opponent's Graveyard, send 1 other Spell/Trap Card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Sea Serpent Type monster on your field gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn, and you gain 1000 LP. Then, if that monster is a Maximum Monster, it cannot be destroyed by battle or your opponent's card effects this turn.

name: Abysslayer Apsaras
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 10 or more cards in your Deck.
[EFFECT]
Place up to 3 Sea Serpent Type monsters from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck in any order. Then, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Sea Serpent Type monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Attack Position. Then, if you have no monsters in your Graveyard, you can destroy 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field.

name: Abysslayer Cetus
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a monster on their field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Sea Serpent Type monster on your field gains 400 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have no monsters in your Graveyard, that monster on your field gains 600 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Abysslayer Leviaknight
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of Level 10 or higher Sea Serpent Type monsters in your Graveyard] x 500. Also, if you have 3 or more Level 10 or higher Sea Serpent Type monsters in your Graveyard, this card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects during their turn.

name: Abysslayer Makara
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 10 or more cards in your Deck.
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent a Sea Serpent Type monster to the Graveyard by this effect, draw 1 card.

name: Abysslayer Vodyanoy
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have no other monsters on your field, reveal 1 LIGHT or DARK Attribute Sea Serpent Type monster in your hand and place it on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, if you have no monsters in your Graveyard, draw 1 additional card.

name: Acacia the Shadow Flower Priestess
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Level 7 or higher Plant Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Defense Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Attack Position. Then, if you changed a monster to face-up Attack Position by this effect, gain LP equal to [that monster's original ATK].

name: Accel Wonder Flare
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 400 damage to your opponent. Then, if you inflicted damage to your opponent by this effect, you can make 1 face-up monster on your field become Spellcaster Type until the end of this turn.

name: Accel Wonder Pebble
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You Normal Summoned this card this turn and have no other monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Spellcaster Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Accel Wonder Supra
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Increase the Level of 1 face-up Spellcaster Type monster on your field by 2 and its ATK by 200 until the end of this turn.

name: Acetic Acid Trap Hole
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a Level 3 or lower Effect Monster.
[EFFECT]
Destroy that monster.

name: Achacha Catcher
lore: An enchanting baseball warrior with a clever lead that throws the ball like an arrow. He is called the keystone of the team, and is the type whose blazing playstyle helps lead the way for his teammates.

name: Advance Impact
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Choose 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field, and send monsters from your hand to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal the chosen monster's Level. This turn, if you would Tribute Summon a monster, you can Tribute the chosen opponent's face-up monster instead of 1 monster on your field.

name: Aero Sorcerer
lore: A magician who enjoys being as free as the wind blows. His selfish behavior will eventually bind his future.

name: Against Buster
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
1 face-up WIND Attribute monster with 2000 or more ATK on your field loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn, then you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Agaribel, the Finest Sushi Fairy
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Fairy Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your field gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Air Formula Eagle
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 3 or more WIND Attribute Normal Monsters in your Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 WIND Attribute Normal Monster from your hand to your field face-up, then you can Special Summon 1 Level 6 or lower WIND Attribute Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your field face-up.

name: Aitsu (Rush Duel)
lore: He seems to be very unreliable, but he might have incredible potential.

name: Alchemicalize Salamandra
lore:
"Chemicalize Salamander" + "Super Assistant Achi"

[REQUIREMENT]
During your Main Phase this card was Special Summoned.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all Spell/Trap Cards on the field. Then, you can make all face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose ATK equal to [the number of Spell Cards destroyed by this effect] x 1000 until the end of this turn.

name: Alco the Flame Emperor of the Lamp
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Pay 500 LP.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Ethyl the Flame Jinn of the Lamp" or "Methyl the Flame Jinn of the Lamp" from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, if you have "Ethyl the Flame Jinn of the Lamp" and "Methyl the Flame Jinn of the Lamp" face-up on your field, this card gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Alien 33
lore: A workaholic professional who specializes in the designing and maintenance of spacecraft. He's part of a crazy plan at a certain facility.

name: Alien Count of the White Dwarf, St. Germain
lore: A count who has been rumored to live for over 300 years. Immediately after he gets a haircut, he cannot fire his lasers.

name: Alien Shocktrooper (Rush Duel)
lore: The Aliens have used a mysterious biological substance to create a supreme race of soldiers. They do not have the natural powers of the other Aliens, but can make stunning physical attacks.

name: All For Naught - Bubble Burst
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your face-up Level 8 or higher Aqua Type monster.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 600 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if your opponent has a face-up Spellcaster Type monster on their field, 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 1,000,000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: All-Seeing Harvey
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During your Main Phase this card was Normal or Special Summoned.
[EFFECT]
Look at 1 face-down card on your opponent's field. Then, if that card is a Monster Card with 1500 or more DEF, you can destroy it.

name: Alligator's Sword (Rush Duel)
lore: ey, dis mighty lissard man can swing his sword so fast, dat it's more dan da speed a sound!

name: Alligator's Sword Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore:
"Baby Dragon" + "Alligator's Sword"

[REQUIREMENT]
The only face-up monsters on your opponent's field are EARTH, WATER, or FIRE Attribute.
[EFFECT]
This turn, this card can attack directly.

name: Almastra XI - Aquarius
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has 2 or more face-up monsters on their field.
[EFFECT]
Excavate the top 4 cards of your Deck. If [the total Levels of the excavated monsters] is 11 or higher, you can destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field. Shuffle the excavated cards into the Deck.

name: Alpha Burn Drake
lore: A dragon whelp with endless possibilities. It yearns for the vast and endless VR world created by goggles.

name: Alpiris the Sower
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you Normal Summoned this card this turn and the only face-up monsters on your field are Plant Type monsters, place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if a Plant Type monster(s) is among the cards sent, you can draw 1 card.

name: Altierra the Skysavior Transience
lore:
"Ciela the Skysavior Knight" + "Lua the Skysavior Angel"

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
Your opponent cannot activate Normal Spell Cards, except "Fusion".

name: Ama Lilith
lore: A girl who freely plays her emotions into song. Her favorite feelings will never lose their color.

name: Amabie (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Both players gain 300 LP.

name: Amazing Dealer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have 3 or less monsters in your Graveyard, pay 300 LP.
[EFFECT]
Send 3 cards from your hand to the Graveyard. Then, draw 3 cards.

name: Ampler Glee
lore: An informant with a big-sisterly personality. She helps Bandijo's gang on their quest to discover their tribe's secrets.

name: Amusi Annoyance
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a card is sent to your opponent's Graveyard during their Main Phase.
[EFFECT]
Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of cards in their hand] x 300. Then, if you activated this card when a card was sent from the Deck to your opponent's Graveyard, send 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard.

name: Amusi Howling Performer
lore:
"Amusi Performer" + "Howlingbird"

[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 "Amusi Performer" or "Howlingbird" from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

name: Amusi Performer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Pay 800 LP.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

name: Analyze Phlogiston
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Spell/Trap Card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle 3 Pyro Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck, whose total Levels equal [the total Levels of the Attack Position Level 8 or lower monsters on your opponent's field]. Then, destroy all Attack Position Level 8 or lower monsters on your opponent's field. This turn, you can only attack with 1 monster.

name: Anchor Moray
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have "Umi" or "Big Umi" face-up on your field.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Level 3 or lower Fish Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Anciant Barrier
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's Level 8 or lower monster declares an attack, shuffle 2 Insect Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 800 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if a face-up Defense Position Insect Type monster is on the field, you can destroy the attacking monster.

name: Ancient Arise Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 600 ATK until the end of this turn. If you have "Clear Ice Dragon" and "Burning Blaze Dragon" in your Graveyard, you can also shuffle both into the Deck. If you do, you can destroy 1 face-up monster with 1500 or less DEF on your opponent's field.

name: Ancient Arrive Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Up to 2 face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose 400 ATK until the end of this turn, then you can Special Summon up to 1 each of "Clear Ice Dragon" and "Burning Blaze Dragon" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Ancient Barrier
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 monsters with the same Type from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
This turn, up to 2 face-up Level 8 or lower monsters on your field cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

name: Ancient Lizard Warrior (Rush Duel)
lore: Before the dawn of man, this lizard warrior ruled supreme.

name: Ancient Rules (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher Normal Monster from your hand face-up to your field.

name: Ancient Telescope (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Your opponent excavates the top 5 cards of their Deck and shows them, then your opponent places the excavated cards on the top of their Deck in the same order.

name: Ancient Turtle Protector
lore: A respecter of tradition that reminisces about times long past. Those really were the good old days.

name: Angel Judge
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Fairy Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Place 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field on the bottom of the Deck.

name: Anglercoilfish
lore: A goosefish with a developed organ that produces electricity. It attacks its enemies with electric shocks and its sharp fangs.

name: Anglered Digra
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if an Insect Type monster(s) is among the cards sent, this card gains ATK equal to [the number of monsters sent to the Graveyard by this effect] x 400 until the end of this turn.

name: Anmagmabear
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have no other monsters on your field, place 1 Pyro Type monster from your Graveyard on the bottom of your Deck.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Pyro Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Ansler the Magical Swordsman
lore: A magical sword that uses a flame spirit puppet to wield itself. It is said that the sword recognizes the one who can best the flame spirit as its true wielder.

name: Antiberty Flag
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Insect Type monster with 100 or less ATK from your hand or your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Antrebellion of the Rebellion
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Pay 100 LP.
[EFFECT]
All Attack Position Insect Type monsters with 100 or less ATK on your field gain ATK equal to [the number of monsters on your field] x 800 until the end of this turn.

name: Ants Running About
lore: Although they always suffer in silence, they swear an oath to inevitably revolt.

name: Apocalypse - Beast Gear World
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up Beast-Warrior, Fiend, and Machine Type monsters on the field gain 300 ATK, and face-up Dragon, Spellcaster, and Fairy Type monsters on the field lose 300 ATK.

name: Apocalypse - Legend of the Warrior
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Level 7 or higher Beast-Warrior Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Beast-Warrior Type monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position.

name: Apocalypse - The Unstoppable Beast-Warrior
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have "Apocalypse - Beast Gear World" face-up on your field, pay 1000 LP.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Beast-Warrior Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. If the monster Special Summoned by this effect attacks a Defense Position monster this turn, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Applizard
lore: A race of dragonoids that have transformed from being mere dragons. They demonstrate both great cunning and agility, and can wield their tablets when they attack as both swords and shields.

name: Aqua Boost
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have "Umi" or "Big Umi" face-up on your field.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Fish Type monster on your field gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up Fish Type monsters on your field] x 300 until the end of this turn.

name: Aqua Sorcerer
lore: A magician with a pure mind that's beyond reproach. His unclouded eyes were supposed to always see the way to the path of reason, but at some point he began hiding them behind a mask.

name: Archfiend Marmot of Deliciousness
lore: An air marmot that has a nefarious dipping sauce and dish. It attacks by throwing around steak-cut rankings.

name: Archfiend Marmot of Nefariousness (Rush Duel)
lore: An air marmot that has a nefarious horn and wings. It attacks by throwing acorns.

name: Archfiend Soldier (Rush Duel)
lore: An expert at battle who belongs to a crack diabolical unit. He's famous because he always gets the job done.

name: Archfiend Warrior
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have another face-up Fiend Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. If a Level 6 Fiend Type monster(s) is among the cards sent, draw 1 card.

name: Archfiend's Revival
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your "Summoned Skull" or Level 7 or higher Fiend Type Normal Monster is destroyed by an opponent's attack.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Archfiend's Summoning Flute
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no other monsters on your field and have 3 or more Normal Monsters in your Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Send this card from your field to the Graveyard, then Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position.

name: Area 33
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Activate this card if you have 2 or more face-up Level 3 or lower Reptile Type Normal Monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up Reptile Type Normal Monsters on the field gain 600 ATK.

name: Arma Knight (Rush Duel)
lore: An ammonite warrior that has protected the seas throughout history.

name: Armaments of Ascension
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Increase the Level of the equipped monster by 2 and its ATK/DEF by 200.

name: Armored Lizard (Rush Duel)
lore: A lizard with a very tough hide and a vicious bite.

name: Aromagmabear
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send up to 2 cards from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Gain LP equal to [the number of cards sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement] x 300.

name: Arts Angel CD Fender
lore: A battle anthem valkyrie who once flourished in Heaven. Her rainbow-colored shield reads and reflects any attack.

name: Arts Angel Dia Needle
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Choose 1 face-up DARK Attribute Fairy Type monster on your field. If it attacks a Defense Position monster this turn, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Arts Angel Glyco Razer
lore: A music weapon that fell from heaven. Its special sound waves that it releases are as sharp as a laser.

name: Arts Angel Guard Dolby
lore: A rookie angel who reads out letters from a flying radio. The first is a letter from Radio Name: Mr. Corrupt Hermit.

name: Arts Angel Metal Position
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your LP are lower than your opponent's, send 1 other face-up DARK Attribute Fairy Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 face-down monster on your opponent's field to face-up Defense Position. Then, inflict damage to your opponent equal to [its original ATK].

name: Arzareth the Sweeping Wind
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 2 cards from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Asbolus the Star Knight
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Change 1 Attack Position Level 5 or higher Fiend Type monster on your field to face-up Defense Position.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on either side of the field gains 600 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Ascending Evolution
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a Level 7 or higher monster.
[EFFECT]
This turn, 1 face-up Level 7 or higher Dinosaur Type monster on your field gains 1500 ATK, and cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

name: Ascending Weather Eel
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Excavate the top 2 cards of your Deck. You can add 1 excavated Level 10 monster to your hand. Shuffle the remaining cards into the Deck.

name: Asport Pirate the Wind Crusher
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have 3 or more Psychic Type monsters in your Graveyard, pay 1000 LP.
[EFFECT]
Add Level 4 or lower monsters from your opponent's Graveyard to their hand, up to [the number of face-up monsters on your opponent's field]. Then, this card gains ATK equal to [the total number of cards in both players' hands] x 100 until the end of this turn.

name: Assault Armato
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have 3 face-up Machine Type monsters on your field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 300 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.

name: Asteroeva
lore: A space life form that travels through space by piloting a UFO that looks like a rock. Jubyidoggu Higyumei!

name: Astrobio Drake
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During your Main Phase this card was Normal or Special Summoned.
[EFFECT]
Set 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone. This turn, you can only attack directly with Fusion Monsters.

name: Astrorescue
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has a monster on their field and you have 2 face-up Normal Monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand. This turn, you cannot attack with Level 8 or lower Effect Monsters.

name: Astrosoldier
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
If you have a monster on your field equipped with an Equip Spell Card, this card gains 700 ATK.

name: Atlas Combat Beetle
lore: A type of beetle that fights over dark tree sap. It has more power than you can even imagine.

name: Attolashoot Highdron
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have 3 or more Cyberse Type monsters in your Graveyard, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of monsters in your Graveyard] x 100 until the end of this turn. Then, if you have 8 or more Cyberse Type monsters in your Graveyard, you can draw 1 card.

name: Attribute Shift Bomb
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Reveal 1 monster in your hand to your opponent.
[EFFECT]
The Attributes of up to 3 face-up monsters on your opponent's field become the same as the monster revealed to meet the requirement.

name: Attron
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no other monsters on your field and have "Femtron" in your Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Send this card from your field to the Graveyard and draw 1 card.

name: Aura Buster
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up Warrior Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. Also, if you have an Equip Spell Card in your Graveyard, the equipped monster inflicts piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference), if it attacks a Defense Position monster.

name: Auto Reverse
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has 3 monsters on their field.
[EFFECT]
Change all Attack Position monsters on your opponent's field to face-down Defense Position. Then, you can change up to 3 face-down monsters on your opponent's field to face-up Attack Position.

name: Automatic Accident Prevention
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent draws for their normal draw in their Draw Phase while you have 2 or more cards in your hand.
[EFFECT]
Draw 2 cards. Then, you can Special Summon up to 3 monsters from your hand to your field in face-down Defense Position.

name: Avian Spell Strategy
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 2 or more face-up Warrior and/or Winged Beast Type monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field. Then, you can place 1 Level 8 or lower Warrior or Winged Beast Type monster from your Graveyard on top of the Deck.

name: Axetion Melody the Music Princess
lore:
"Tubardiche the Music Princess" + "Boton the Music Princess"

[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard on either the top or bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 2000 ATK/DEF until the end of your opponent's next turn. Then, if you placed "Straight Pierce" or "Fusion" to meet the requirement, you can draw 1 card.

name: BBQ
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 Beast Type monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
All face-up FIRE Attribute monsters on the field gain ATK equal to [the number of face-up FIRE Attribute monsters on the field] x 100 until the end of this turn.

name: B.B.B. - Beast Brave Brandish
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 Maximum Monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, you can choose 1 monster in Maximum Mode on your field. If you do, while that monster is face-up, it inflicts piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference), if it attacks a Defense Position monster.

name: Baby Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore: Much more than just a child, this dragon is gifted with untapped power.

name: Babysitter Goat
lore: A playmate for children of the underworld. Though it is a hard worker, it eats any paper it sees. As its ward grows into an adult, its magical power also grows.

name: Back Beat
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle 2 to 7 monsters with the same Type from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck. Then, if you shuffled 4 or more monsters by this effect, you can draw 1 card.

name: Back Jersey
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a Level 5 or higher monster face-up, pay 500 LP.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster with 500 DEF on your field gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can shuffle up to 5 monsters from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck.

name: Back To The Fusion
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 2 or more face-up monsters with the same name on your field.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, if you have 2 or more Normal Monsters with the same name in your Graveyard, you can add 1 of them to your hand.

name: Bait Bite Ball
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
All face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose ATK equal to [the number of face-up Level 3 or lower Fish Type monsters on your field] x 300 until the end of this turn.

name: Baked Bean Soldier
lore: A surprisingly hot plant-warrior that attacks with seeds and sword.

name: Bandijo of the Battle Ballad
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, pay 1000 LP.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Level 2 or lower Psychic Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, this card gains ATK equal to [the total number of cards in both players' hands] x 300 until the end of this turn.

name: Barbeque Ox
lore: A cattle monster with tremendously tasty tongue and stomach, it burns enemies with a swing of its skewer.

name: Barrel Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Choose 1 monster on your opponent's field, and toss a coin 3 times. If at least 2 of the results are heads, destroy that monster.

name: Barrier Armordillo
lore: An unexpectedly powerful armadillo that can deflect anything that comes close. It can use its tank treads to skillfully dig.

name: Barrier Statue of the Inferno (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
Neither player can Special Summon non-FIRE Attribute monsters.

name: Bascule the Moving Fortress
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change this card's battle position (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position). Then, Special Summon 1 EARTH Attribute Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Battle Demotion
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack on your face-up Machine Type monster, pay 600 LP.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Attack Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Defense Position.

name: Battle Shark Samegalon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 WATER Attribute monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Defense Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Attack Position.

name: Bean Soldier (Rush Duel)
lore: A plant-warrior that attacks with seeds and sword.

name: Bean Soljersey
lore: A jersey-warrior that attacks with seeds and sword.

name: Beast Battlefield Barrier
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up monsters on the field lose 200 ATK, and face-up Beast Type Normal Monsters on the field gain 400 DEF.

name: Beast Drive Mega Elephant
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a Level 6 or lower Beast Type Normal Monster in your Graveyard, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 6 or lower Beast Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, if you have 3 or more Beast Type Normal Monsters in your Graveyard, you can draw 1 card.

name: Beast Gear Buggy Dog
lore: A canine that extorts scraps of dog food from an old man. He is full of himself and acts tough, but has no real convictions. He used to hate living life on a leash, but now he feels that he was happier just to have an owner.

name: Beast Gear Emperor Catapult Kong
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send up to 2 face-up Beast-Warrior Type monsters other than this card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy Defense Position monsters on your opponent's field equal to [the number of monsters sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement].

name: Beast Gear Emperor Glider Fox
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 other face-up Beast-Warrior Type monster with 1500 or more ATK from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field. This turn, you can only attack with Beast-Warrior Type monsters.

name: Beast Gear Gyro Jackal
lore: A beast that drives around wildly, always in search of some fun. He is petty, and only picks fights he thinks he can win, so he often falls to unexpected counterattacks. He grows uninhibited when he's got friends around, which leads to misunderstandings, and he still hasn't figured out that he can't do anything on his own.

name: Beast Gear King Convoy Liogon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 2 face-up Level 4 or lower, Beast-Warrior Type monsters from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the total Level of the monsters sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement] x 100 until the end of this turn. Also this turn, you can only attack with this card, can only declare an attack on Attack Position monsters, and can attack all monsters on the opponent's monsters once each.

name: Beast Gear Moto Wolf
lore: A beast continually looting citizens of their food and gasoline. He might appear to be a lone wolf, but he believes that evil is right and does everything he can for his gang. For such a wicked criminal, one can't help but wonder why his distant howls touch the heart so deeply.

name: Beast Gear Sage Roller Stag
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During your Main Phase that you Normal or Special Summoned this card, pay 700 LP.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Attack Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Defense Position. Then, you can add 1 "Apocalypse - Beast Gear World" or "Beast Gear Secret Art - Primal Fist" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Beast Gear Secret Art - Primal Fist
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your face-up Level 7-9 Beast-Warrior, Fiend, or Machine Type monster.
[EFFECT]
Change the attacking monster to face-up Defense Position. Then, if you changed a Dragon, Spellcaster, or Fairy Type monster to Defense Position by this effect, destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Beast Gear Side Fennec
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 Beast-Warrior Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Beast-Warrior Type monster on your field gains 400 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have a face-up Spell Card on your field, you can make 1 face-up monster on your field gain 400 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Beast Gear Trike Fox
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You Normal Summoned this card this turn and your opponent has 3 monsters on their field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 or lower Beast-Warrior Type monster from your hand face-up to your field. Your Level 6 or lower monsters cannot attack this turn.

name: Beast Summoner
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a face-up Level 6 or higher monster on their field, send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 or lower Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged Beast Type monster from your hand to your field, face-up.

name: Beast Swords - Tiger Sabre
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up Normal Monster with 1400 or less ATK on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains 900 ATK. The equipped monster can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a monster in Attack Position.

name: Beaver Warrior (Rush Duel)
lore: What this creature lacks in size it makes up for in defense when battling in the prairie.

name: Begonia the Pressed Shadow Flower
lore: A flower spirit that never abandons her beloved. She is always happy.

name: Behemoth the King of All Animals (Rush Duel)
lore:
You can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 1 monster. If you do, its original ATK becomes 2000.

[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Add Beast Type monsters from your Graveyard to your hand equal to [the number of monsters Tributed for the Tribute Summon of this card].

name: Bendorbreak the Conqueror
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If [the number of face-up monsters on your opponent's field] and [the number of Spell/Trap Cards on your field] are the same, send up to 3 Spell/Trap Cards from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses ATK/DEF equal to [the number of cards sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement] x 1000 until the end of this turn.

name: Berceptacle Mani
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses ATK equal to [the number of face-up Cyberse Type monsters on your field] x 300 until the end of this turn.

name: Berry Bassist
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Psychic Type monster other than this card on your field, pay 500 LP.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 2 Psychic Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Berry Fresh Happiness
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Aqua Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 1500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you sent a monster with 100 or less ATK to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Berserker Colosseum
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Activate this card by sending the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up monsters on the field gain 100 ATK.

name: Best Bite
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Level 7 or higher Beast Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if 4 FIRE Attribute Beast Type monsters were sent to the Graveyard by this effect, 1 face-up monster on the field gains 2900 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Beta Burn Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You Normal Summoned this card this turn and have another face-up Dragon Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of monsters on their field] x 100.

name: Betrayer of Peace
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Attack Position Warrior Type monster on the field to face-up Defense Position.

name: Big Bang Egger
lore: Which came first, space or the egg? This girl has an explosive imagination.

name: Big Umi
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Activate this card if you have 3 face-up WATER Attribute monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up non-WATER Attribute monsters on the field lose 300 ATK/DEF.

name: Binding Chain (Rush Duel)
lore: The mystic links of this chain can rob enemies of their power.

name: Bio Mechamantis
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 Insect Type monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 300 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can make that monster become Insect Type until the end of this turn.

name: Bizarrmor
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 3 Level 7 or higher monsters with different Types from your Graveyard on the top or bottom of the Deck in any order.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand, then you can make 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field lose 1500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Black Dragon's Chick (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" from your hand face-up to your field.

name: Black Dragon's Roar
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a Level 5 or higher monster.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Dragon Type Normal Monster on your field gains 700 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn. Then, if you have a face-up "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" on your field, you can place 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard on top of the Deck.

name: Black Handshaker
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Shuffle 1 card from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck. Then, if you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Normal Monster on your field, you can change 1 Attack Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Defense Position.

name: Black Luster Jersey Ritual
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 2 monsters from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 8 monster with 500 DEF from your hand face-up to your field. This turn, the monster Special Summoned by this effect gains 500 ATK, it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Black Luster Soljersey
lore: A Super Soldier that appears due to Black Luster Jersey Ritual. He cuts though his enemies with his deadly Chaos Nylon Blade.

name: Black Luster Soljersey - Envoy of the Drying
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 monsters with 500 DEF and different Attributes from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Place 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster from your opponent's field on the bottom of the owner's Deck. This turn, this card cannot attack directly.

name: Bladearmor King Dynas Dorcus
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 3 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Level 5-8 Insect Type monster on your opponent's field. This turn, you can only attack with Insect Type monsters.

name: Blades of Divine Wind
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Destroy 2 face-up Normal Monsters on your field and 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field.

name: Bladesaurus
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 200 ATK until the end of this turn, then you can add up to 1 each of "Jurassic World" and "Wasteland" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Blanc de Blanc the Snow Shadow Flower
lore: A pure and innocent flower spirit. It gently responds to the desires of its Lord that believes in it.

name: Blast Examiner
lore: A specialist in safety assurance. She tends to be overlooked due to her work habits, but she's got a positive and gentle personality.

name: Blast Jaws
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has 1 or less cards in their hand, shuffle 1 Thunder Type monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Thunder Type monster on your field gains 400 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Blasting Bird
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Reveal 2 Spell/Trap Cards in your hand.
[EFFECT]
This turn, this face-up card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a Winged Beast Type monster in Attack Position.

name: Blaze Fiend Assault
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 3 FIRE Attribute Maximum Monsters from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle all face-up monsters on your opponent's field into the owner's Deck. Then, you can make 1 face-up Maximum Monster on your field gain 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Blaze Fiend Overlords Beelucitaroth
lore:
You can Maximum Summon this card together with "Blaze Fiend Overlords Beelucitaroth [L]" and "Blaze Fiend Overlords Beelucitaroth [R]".

[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
Increase this card's Level by 6, also it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

name: Blaze Fiend Overlords Beelucitaroth [L]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card cannot be destroyed by battle with a Normal Monster.

name: Blaze Fiend Overlords Beelucitaroth [R]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This turn, this card gains 600 ATK, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Blazebolt Chemistorm Fenghuang Volcalize Phoenix
lore:
You can Maximum Summon this card together with "Blazebolt Chemistorm Fenghuang Volcalize Phoenix [L]" and "Blazebolt Chemistorm Fenghuang Volcalize Phoenix [R]".

[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode: Send 1 FIRE Attribute or Pyro Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. Then, this turn, this card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Blazebolt Chemistorm Fenghuang Volcalize Phoenix [L]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 FIRE Attribute Thunder Type monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Level 9 or lower monster on your opponent's field. Then, if this card is in Maximum Mode, you can destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field.

name: Blazebolt Chemistorm Fenghuang Volcalize Phoenix [R]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 FIRE Attribute Aqua Type monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field. Then, if this card is in Maximum Mode, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Blazing Chestnut
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Warrior Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if a monster is sent to the Graveyard by this effect, 1 face-up Warrior Type monster on your field gains ATK equal to [the Level of the monster sent to the Graveyard by this effect] x 300 until the end of this turn and you take the same amount of damage.

name: Bleach Mortar
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Level 7 or higher monster on your opponent's field loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

name: Blitzkrieg Cavalry Triggerdrago
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 300 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if your opponent has no cards in their hand, this card inflicts piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference), if it attacks a Defense Position monster this turn.

name: Block Attack (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Attack Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Defense Position.

name: Blue Falcon Tengu
lore: A ruthless tengu who leaves opponents stunned by attacking without mercy.

name: Blue Medicine (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Gain 400 LP.

name: Blue Tooth Burst Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all face-up monsters with 1500 or less ATK on your opponent's field. Then, this card gains ATK equal to [the number of monsters destroyed by this effect] x 300 until the end of this turn.

name: Blue Tooth Enhanced Burst Dragon
lore:
"Blue Tooth Burst Dragon" + "Booster Wyvern"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up card on either field. Then, if you sent a monster whose original Level is 7 or higher to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, you can Special Summon 1 "Blue Tooth Burst Dragon" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Blue-Eyed Silver Zombie (Rush Duel)
lore: The beams from the eyes of this creature are said to turn enemies into zombies.

name: Blue-Eyes White Cat
lore: A white cat with blue eyes. Said to bring good luck if treated well.

name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

name: Bluegrass Stealer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent a Psychic Type monster to the Graveyard by this effect, you can choose 1 face-up Psychic Type monster on your field. This turn, the chosen monster can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a WIND Attribute Psychic Type monster in Attack Position.

name: Bobble Header
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Add up to 2 "Feverous Spirit Stadium" and/or "Tag-Up-Magic Sacrifice Force" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Bolt the Conduction Spirit
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Level 5 or 10 Pyro or Aqua Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, you can add 1 "Chemicalize Structure Force" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Bombing Bird
lore: A bird that drops bombs. There may be a tiny person inside.

name: Bonded Bowing
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Change 1 Attack Position Level 7 or higher Warrior Type monster on your field to face-up Defense Position.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card.

name: Boost Rescue
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster face-up.
[EFFECT]
Draw 2 cards. Then, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard. Then, you can change up to 2 Attack Position monsters on your field to face-up Defense Position.

name: Booster Wyvern
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have "Blue Tooth Burst Dragon" or "Red Boot Boost Dragon" face-up on your field during your Main Phase this card was Normal or Special Summoned.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 600 damage to your opponent.

name: Boosturtle
lore: A turtle born from a plan of utter madness. It seems to move through space how it pleases using its booster rockets.

name: Boton the Music Princess
lore: The mediator of the band. She conducts her unique and colorful group of friends with her nimble polemanship. She sulks and pouts when people point out her glasses.

name: Bowing Brotherhood
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent draws for their normal draw in their Draw Phase, pay 1000 LP.
[EFFECT]
Change up to 2 Attack Position monsters on your field to face-up Defense Position. Then, if you have 3 Defense Position monsters on your field, you can shuffle up to 5 monsters from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck.

name: Braid Blade Reader
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monster or 1 Spell Card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. If a LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monster(s) is among the cards sent, you can add 1 Equip Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Brain Harvester
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has 2 or more monsters on their field, send up to 2 Fairy Type monsters from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw cards equal to [the number of monsters sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement].

name: Brassaxophone the Music Princess
lore: The heart and soul of the band. Her dynamic tones make her an excellent solo fighter, but she needs help to equip the weapon on her left arm.

name: Breaking News!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a face-up Machine Type monster on your field is destroyed by an opponent's attack or their card effect.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 300 damage to your opponent. Then, you can Special Summon up to 2 "ExPress Train" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Bright Sentinel
lore: A galactic warrior that protects order. When its companions are in trouble, it comes rushing with a flash. Migyui Gyaran Gonaidyue!

name: Brocoohearted Pigeon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a Level 5 or higher monster face-up while you have a face-up Winged Beast Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Attack Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Defense Position. Then, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

name: Brutal Retribution
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When 2 or more face-up Normal Monsters on your field are destroyed at the same time by an opponent's card effect.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon up to 2 monsters from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Bubble Kingdom
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up Aqua Type Normal Monsters on the field gain 500 ATK.

name: Bubbleburst Shock!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Level 8 or higher Aqua Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Take damage equal to [the total ATK of all face-up Level 8 or lower monsters on your opponent's field]. Then, if you took damage by this effect, destroy all face-up Level 8 or lower monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Bubbly Elf
lore: This girl is delicate no more. While poised and collected, she's always down to party. Pager pals with LaMoon the Party Princess.

name: Buffered Slime
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's Level 8 or lower monster declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. This turn, you take no battle damage. Also, if your LP are 3000 or more, take 2000 damage.

name: Bull Breaker
lore: Incredibly useful on site, but the lease is exorbitant. Planning is the biggest part of the job.

name: Buried Shield
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a monster, place 1 Field Spell Card from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Change that monster to face-down Defense Position. Then, you can make 1 face-up Wyrm Type monster on your field gain 500 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.

name: Burning Blaze Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 Level 5 or lower Dragon Type monster from your Graveyard on the bottom of your Deck.
[EFFECT]
Destroy a face-up Field Spell Card on your opponent's field.

name: Burst Breath of Destruction
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Level 7 or higher Dragon Type Normal Monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all face-up Level 6 or lower monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Burst Stream of Destruction (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" on your field.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all monsters on your opponent's field. This turn, you cannot attack with "Blue-Eyes White Dragon".

name: Burstray Gunman
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Reveal 1 Level 7 or higher Galaxy Type monster in your hand.
[EFFECT]
Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of face-up monsters on their field] x 200. Then, you can make 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field become LIGHT Attribute until the end of this turn.

name: Business Card Barrage
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have "Worker Warrior - Sinister CEO" face-up on your field.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Level 7 or lower monster on your opponent's field. Then, if you destroyed a monster by this effect, you can Special Summon 1 Level 5 or lower Machine Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Buster Blader (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the  number of Dragon Type monsters on your opponent's field and in their Graveyard] x 500.

name: Call of the Earthbound (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
You choose the attack target for your opponent's attack.

name: CAN - I:D
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If the only monsters in your Graveyard are Omega Psychic and/or Psychic Type, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 Psychic Type monster from your hand face-up to your field. Then, if you have "CAN:D" in your Graveyard, this card gains 700 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: CAN - Melo:D
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Return 1 other face-up Level 5 or higher monster from your field to the hand.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle 1 face-down card from your opponent's field into the Deck. Then, if your LP are lower than your opponent's, you can add 1 Level 1 Psychic Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: CAN - Re:D
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Return 1 face-up monster with 500 or less ATK from your field to the hand. This turn, while this card is face-up, you cannot Tribute Summon monsters with 1500 or more DEF in Attack Position.

name: CAN - Sp:D
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have another face-up Omega Psychic or Psychic Type monster on your field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This turn, 1 face-up monster on your field gains 200 ATK and your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards when it declares an attack.

name: CAN:D
lore: Carrying infinite potential, she continues to chase her shining dream with a smile on her face.

name: CAN:D ALL
lore:
"CAN:D" + "Ice Pop Bear"

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 6 or lower Psychic Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: CAN:D LIVE
lore:
"CAN:D" + "Psypickupper"

[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has a monster on their field.
[MULTI-CHOICE EFFECT]
 Take 2000 damage. Then, you can make all face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose 3000 ATK until the end of this turn. Gain 1000 LP. Then, you can Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher Psychic Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Cannon Soldier (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 monster on your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

name: Cannon Soljersey
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have another face-up monster with 500 DEF on your field, send 1 face-up monster with 500 DEF from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 500 damage to your opponent. Then, you can make 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field lose 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Captain #39: Home Plate Pinch Hitter
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 3 Level 4 FIRE Attribute monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 1500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if your LP are 1000 or lower, you can make 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field lose 3000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Card Destruction (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Each player with cards in their hand sends their entire hand to the Graveyard, then draws cards equal to [the number of cards each player sent to the Graveyard by this effect].

name: Card Devastation
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Each player with cards in their hand sends their entire hand to the Graveyard, then you can make 1 face-up monster on your field gain ATK equal to [the number of cards sent to the Graveyard by this effect] x 300 until the end of this turn.

name: Card Reprinting
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
Draw until you have 5 cards in your hand and reveal all cards in your hand. Then, if there is a monster(s) among them, gain LP equal to [the number of those monsters] x 200.

name: Carpendra
lore: A mass-produced demolition machine with excellent mobility and functionality. The joints are very brittle, meaning its arms and wings often fall off.

name: Cat Claw Girl
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Beast Type monster with 200 DEF from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, if you Special Summoned a Normal Monster by this effect, you can Set 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Cat-trois Choice
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has a monster on their field.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you have 3 or less monsters in your Graveyard, you can add 1 card from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Cat's Eye
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 3 face-up Beast Type monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Your opponent declares 1 card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) and sends the top card of their Deck to the Graveyard. If it was not the declared card type, all face-up monsters on your field can attack directly this turn.

name: Caught in the Rain
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
A face-up Field Spell Card is on the field.
[EFFECT]
All face-up Normal Monsters on your opponent's field lose ATK equal to [the number of monsters on your opponent's field] x 300 until the end of this turn. Then, you can destroy 1 card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Celeb Rose Fabulous Magician
lore:
"Celeb Rose Magician" + "Celeb Rose Witch"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field. Then, you can add 1 Equip Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Celeb Rose Luxury Magicians
lore:
"Celeb Rose Magician" + "Celeb Rose Witch"

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 9 or lower LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position. Then, if this card is equipped with an Equip Spell Card, this card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters this turn.

name: Celeb Rose Mage
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have "Celeb Rose Magician" or an Equip Spell Card in your Graveyard during the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 "Charis Magic Scepter - Death Wand" or "Fusion" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Celeb Rose Magician
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 face-up Equip Spell Card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field. Then, if you have 3 or more Spell Cards in your Graveyard, this card gains 700 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Celeb Rose Sorcerer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 3 face-up LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monsters from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monster with 2500 or less ATK from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, you can Set 1 "Charis Magic Scepter - Death Wand" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Celeb Rose Witch
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have "Celeb Rose Magician" in your Graveyard, send 1 LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monster or 1 Spell Card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Celeb Rose Magician" or 1 Level 9 or lower Spellcaster Type Fusion Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Celebrontosaurus
lore: A newly rich Saurus who changed its name from Petite and became absurdly lucky. It used to live in a cave of all things.

name: Celtic Guardian (Rush Duel)
lore: An elf who learned to wield a sword, he baffles enemies with lightning-swift attacks.

name: Centennial Wooden Blade
lore: A wooden sword with a soul. It's said as it's exchanged hands, it's seen people's fortunes wax and wane.

name: Change of Dessert
lore: An angel-like store attendant that's actually a demon. Her heart is jiggling like jelly, wondering whether to bring the order or not.

name: Change Slime - Dragon Champion Mode
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 non-Fusion Monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Fusion Summon by sending 1 Level 7 Warrior Type monster and 1 Level 5 Dragon Type monster from your hand and/or field to the Graveyard as material.

name: Charis Magic - Elegant Change
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monster or 1 Equip Spell Card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, if you have 4 or more monsters in your Graveyard, draw 1 additional card.

name: Charis Magic Scepter - Death Wand
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains 400 ATK and cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. If the equipped monster is a Fusion Monster, it gains 600 more ATK.

name: Chashooting Star
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons or Special Summons a Level 5 or higher monster face-up.
[EFFECT]
Gain LP equal to [the Level of 1 face-up Pyro Type monster on your field] x 200. Then, return it to the owner's hand.

name: Chemical Cure Blue
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Gain 400 LP. Then, you can add any number of "Blue Medicine" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Chemical Cure Purple
lore:
"Chemical Cure Red" + "Chemical Cure Blue"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send up to 3 Spell/Trap Cards from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw cards equal to [the number of cards sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement], then you can gain 900 LP.

name: Chemical Cure Red
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a monster on their field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Gain 500 LP. Then, you can add any number of "Red Medicine" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Chemicalize Despise
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your face-up Pyro Type monster.
[EFFECT]
Negate the attack. Then, if the attack target's Level is higher than the attacking monster's, you can destroy the attacking monster.

name: Chemicalize Salamander
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 3 Pyro Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
All face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose ATK equal to [the number of monsters in your opponent's Graveyard] x 100 until the end of this turn.

name: Chemicalize Structure Force
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up Aqua, Pyro, or Thunder Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains ATK equal to [the number of different Types on the field] x 300. Then, if the equipped monster is a Maximum Monster, it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

name: Chemicalizer Red
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up Pyro Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains 300 ATK and cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

name: Chemispet Nyanko
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a Pyro, Aqua, or Thunder Type monster in your Graveyard, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Gain 400 LP. Then, you can place 1 Pyro, Aqua, or Thunder Type monster from your Graveyard on top of your Deck.

name: Chemispet Wanko
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have 10 or less monsters in your Graveyard, send 2 cards from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, if you sent 2 Pyro, Aqua, and/or Thunder Type monsters to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, you can draw 1 additional card.

name: Cheron the Star Knight
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a monster on their field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Choose 1 face-up Level 5 or higher Fiend Type monster on your field. If it attacks a Defense Position monster this turn, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Chromatographicus
lore: This flesh may burneth and vaporize... but as long as mine own fighting spirit remains unextinguished, mine own corse shall beest immortal.

name: Chu-Ske the Mouse Fighter (Rush Duel)
lore: A fiery mouse, travelling the world to become the strongest fighter in the world of mice. Be careful not to touch him, or you will get burned.

name: Ciela the Skysavior Knight
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Reveal up to 5 Celestial Warrior Type monsters with different names in your Extra Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses ATK equal to [the number of monsters revealed to meet the requirement] x 200 until the end of this turn. This turn, you can only attack with Celestial Warrior, Warrior, or Fairy Type monsters.

name: Cintamani of Saturnius
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 6 monster on your field, send 1 monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 2 cards.

name: Cladsoul Dragon Gaigias
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard. Then, Special Summon 1 Level 7 Dragon Type monster from your hand to your field in face-up Attack Position. The monster Special Summoned by this effect gains 1500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Clapping Thunder
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 2 or more face-up Thunder Type monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
All face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose 400 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn. Then, if you have 3 Thunder Type monsters on your field, you can draw 1 card.

name: Class-Change Mirror
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 other monster from your field on the bottom of the owner's Deck.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Summoned Skull" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Clawleon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a face-down monster on their field, send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Choose 1 face-up Level 7 or higher Reptile Type monster on your field. If it attacks a Defense Position monster this turn, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Clean Beret - Colonel Mop
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has a face-up Level 7 or higher monster on their field.
[EFFECT]
Place 1 "Bleach Mortar" from your Graveyard on top of your Deck.

name: Cleaning Machine Gorgain
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if an EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster(s) is among the cards sent, you can add 1 Machine Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Clear Ice Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 Level 5 or lower Dragon Type monster from your Graveyard on the bottom of your Deck.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle up to 2 monsters from your opponent's Graveyard into their Deck.

name: Climax Clash
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your EARTH Attribute monster is destroyed by an opponent's attack.
[EFFECT]
Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of EARTH Attribute Normal Monsters in your Graveyard] x 100. Then, you can destroy 1 face-up Normal Monster on your opponent's field.

name: Climax Finale
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Pay LP equal to [the number of Psychic Type monsters in your Graveyard] x 100.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Psychic Type monster on your field gains ATK equal to [the number of Psychic Type monsters in your Graveyard] x 100 until the end of this turn.

name: Cliptera
lore: A winged dragon that glides through the room with its beautiful wings. It captures childlike minds and won't let go of them.

name: Clowning Cookoo Clock
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a monster and you have a face-up Winged Beast Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Night Vision the Phantom Pigeon" from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, gain 1500 LP.

name: Clubinet the Music Princess
lore: The jack of all trades of the band. Her gentle melodies give rise to attacks. When she gets excited, the light on her head lights up.

name: Cobalt Kobold
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Fiend Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card.

name: Cocosh the Spellcaster of Happiness
lore: A spellcaster with a warm and genial heart that makes people around the world smile with her legendary magic, "Danish", that combines many arts and techniques. For her achievements, she's been given the title "Coco". She has a somewhat playful side, as she loves to dote on her companion "Maple".

name: Coevolutionary Miracle
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 face-up Dinosaur Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher Dinosaur Type monster from your hand face-up to your field. It gains ATK equal to [the original Level of the monster sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement] x 100 until the end of this turn.

name: Coiled Dragon of Destruction
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle a face-up Field Spell Card from your field into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 600 damage to your opponent.

name: Coiled Dragon of Fertility
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 Field Spell Card from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 600 damage to your opponent.

name: Collapsing Chairs
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your Attack Position DARK Attribute monster with 0 ATK is destroyed by an opponent's attack.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all Level 8 or lower Attack Position monsters on the field. Then, each player sends cards equal to [the number of monsters destroyed by this effect] from the top of their Deck to the Graveyard.

name: Combustion Oni Bunsel
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Each player sends the top 2 cards of their Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can reduce the Level of 1 face-up Level 3-8 monster on your opponent's field by 1 or 2 until the end of this turn.

name: Concert Costume Creator
lore: A designer that uses her psychic talents to make costumes for shows. She is stubborn and won't accept jobs from artists she doesn't like.

name: Connector Dog
lore: An electronic beast that carries information throughout the Network World. After changes through the generations, its breed improved, resulting in a personality that lacks any hint of being two-faced.

name: Constructor Ambush
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your face-up Wyrm Type monster on your field, send 1 Level 6 or lower Wyrm Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses ATK equal to [the ATK of the monster sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement] until the end of this turn.

name: Constructor Art - Buildestruction
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
All face-up Level 7 or higher Wyrm Type Normal Monsters on your field gain 600 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can make all face-up monsters with 3000 or more ATK on your opponent's field lose 1200 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Constructor Battler Big Roller
lore: A veteran warrior. He uses six types of rollers in his work, but laymen cannot tell the difference between them.

name: Constructor Blockade
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a Level 7 or higher monster, send 1 face-up Wyrm Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Choose 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field. This turn, your opponent cannot attack with monsters with the same Type as that monster.

name: Constructor Demolisher Wyrm Drake Crush
lore: A Constructor Dragon whose entire body is armed with special tools and equipment. It is said it has enough power to demolish any major location in an instant.

name: Constructor Driver Soldier Trailon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no other monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 EARTH Attribute Wyrm Type Maximum Monster from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, if you have a Level 7 or higher Wyrm Type monster in your Graveyard, you can add 1 Maximum Monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Constructor Engineer Draftannium
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Excavate the top card of your Deck. Then, place the excavated card on either the top or bottom of the Deck.

name: Constructor Fighter Mixer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If a face-up Field Spell Card is on the field during the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent a Wyrm Type Normal Monster to the Graveyard by this effect, you can draw 1 card.

name: Constructor Princess Pylon
lore: The princess of the Wyrms that live in Blisstopia. She cherishes the bonds she has with her precious friends.

name: Constructor Resurrection
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your Level 7 or higher Wyrm Type monster is destroyed by an opponent's attack.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher Wyrm Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Constructor Ridge Wyrm Handtoolon
lore:
"Constructor Warrior Shovelon" + "Picklon the Constructor Fairy"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 200 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if a face-up Field Spell Card is not on your field, you can add 1 "Peaks of Blisstopia" or "Silvermountain of Blisstopia" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Constructor Sentry Dragline
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 3 Wyrm Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 8 Wyrm Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, if you Special Summoned "Constructor Wyrm Buildragon" by this effect, you can add 1 Wyrm Type monster with 0 DEF from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Constructor Sky Wyrm Gantry Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
A face-up Field Spell Card is on the field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Constructor Wyrm Buildragon" from your Graveyard face-up to your field. This turn, you can only attack with Wyrm Type monsters.

name: Constructor Soldier Drillzard
lore: A humanoid reincarnated from a dragon. His masterful strategy and deft hands help reduce construction times considerably.

name: Constructor Sword Foreman
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
A face-up Field Spell Card is on the field.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Defense Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Attack Position. Then, if you changed a Normal Monster to face-up Attack Position by this effect, you can draw 1 card.

name: Constructor Warrior Shovelon
lore: A young warrior. Each day he passionately uses his shovel to dig up work sites.

name: Constructor Wyrm Buildragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
A face-up Field Spell Card is on the field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Wyrm Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Corktrooper
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no other monsters on your field and your opponent has 2 or less Spell/Trap Cards on their field.
[EFFECT]
