Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of Spell/Trap Cards on their field] x 300.

name: Corruption of the Blaze Fiends
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 face-up Level 4 or lower Fiend Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Level 10 Fiend Type Maximum Monster from your Graveyard to your hand. This turn, you can only attack with Maximum Monsters.

name: Cosmic String Noodryad
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If "Outer Space" is face-up on the field, send 2 Pyro Type monsters from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all face-up Level 7 or lower monsters on the field.

name: Cosmo Aurorizer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Spell/Trap Card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of Spell/Trap Cards on your opponent's field] x 500 until the end of this turn.

name: Cosmo Predictor
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no other monsters on your field during the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Level 8 Galaxy Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand. This turn, this face-up card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "Greystorm Reverie" in Attack Position.

name: Cosmo Titan
lore: An invasion weapon controlled by five rings. When it arrives, it crushes entire civilizations underfoot. Dyugyaai Bu Zuwaai!

name: Cosmoscallion
lore: A maiden who freely drifts around the Milky Way like a shooting star. Countless people make wishes on her, but she dryly states that real dreams are the ones you can fulfill on your own.

name: Counter Back
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a Spell/Trap Card(s) on your field is destroyed by an opponent's card effect.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Effect Monster with 2300 or more ATK on your opponent's field.

name: Counter Cannonball
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the Level of the attacking monster] x 200.

name: Counter Pigeons
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your Attack Position Winged Beast Type monster.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses ATK equal to [the Level of the attacking monster] x 100 until the end of this turn.

name: Counter Shield
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your face-up Normal Monster, shuffle 1 Normal Monster with 1000 or more DEF from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Covering Barrage
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack on your face-up WIND Attribute monster, shuffle 1 WIND Attribute Normal Monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Crack Fall
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Destroy all cards in the Field Zones. Then, if you destroyed a card by this effect, you can make 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field lose 1000 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.

name: Crack Neutron
lore: A mysterious life form born from the last glittering light. The energy that arises from the cracks in its body contains its will and sense of self. Hyuduuri Viza Bizi!

name: Cracking Claw
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up Dragon Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up Dragon Type monsters on the field] x 200. When the equipped monster attacks a Level 7 or higher Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Crafter Drone
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Machine Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card.

name: Craftroll
lore: A crafting robot popular with children. It's also active as an amusement park mascot. It transforms when the central handle is turned.

name: Cranked to Ten!!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Choose 1 face-up monster on your field. This turn, it gains 400 ATK, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference). If the monster's Level is 10, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

name: Crawling Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore: This weakened dragon can no longer fly, but is still a deadly force to be reckoned with.

name: Cremation Dog Nitro
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 400 damage to your opponent. This turn, you can only attack with Pyro Type monsters.

name: Crisis at the Sacred Tower
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a Level 7 or higher monster.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 face-up Level 8 or lower Effect Monster on your opponent's field to face-down Defense Position.

name: Cross Promotion the Elite Noodle Ninja
lore: The head of the Noodle Ninja Corps who have advanced noodles, overcoming the odds, no matter how noodly things get. He'll gladly speak to people who know nothing of noodles, but he'll make sure neither his location nor his noodles are ever exposed in the process.

name: Cross Target
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's Level 8 or lower monster declares an attack while you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Omega Psychic or Psychic Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Return the attacking monster to the owner's hand. Then, if you have a face-up "Handy Lady" on your field, you can add 1 Level 3 or lower monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Crusher Drone
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have another face-up EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster on your field, send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 400 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Crying Moon Rabbit
lore: The days and months flowed by. Each day was full. Those really were the good old days.

name: Crystal Brain
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Each player sends cards equal to [the number of face-up Cyberse Type monsters on your field] from the top of their Deck to the Graveyard.

name: Cure Shot
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
Gain LP equal to [the Level of 1 WATER Attribute monster in your Graveyard] x 100, and inflict damage to your opponent equal to [that monster's Level] x 100.

name: Curse of Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore: A wicked dragon that taps into dark forces to execute a powerful attack.

name: Cursed Skeletal Dragon Diarga
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have another face-up Zombie Type monster on your field, send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Level 5 or higher monster on your opponent's field loses 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Cursed Sword of the East

[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Normal Monster on your opponent's field.

name: Curtain of Sparks
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack and you have a Spellcaster Type monster in your Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

lore:
You can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 1 face-up "Cyber Dragon".

[REQUIREMENT]

[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster with 2400 or more ATK on your opponent's field.

name: Cyber Coatl
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no other monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck. You can Special Summon 1 excavated Level 5 Machine Type monster face-up to your field. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: Cyber Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore:
If only your opponent has a monster on the field, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
None

"Cyber Dragon" + "Cyber Dragon" + "Cyber Dragon"

None

If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

[EFFECT]
This card's name becomes "Cyber Dragon" this turn. Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Cyber Dragon" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

lore:
"Cyber Dragon" + "Cyber Dragon"

[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has a monster on their field.

Draw until you have 5 cards in your hand. Then, send 4 cards from your hand to the Graveyard. Then, you can Special Summon 1 Machine Type monster from your hand face-up to your field.

name: Cyber Search Dragon
lore:
You can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 1 face-up "Cyber Dragon".

[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Cyber Dragon" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Cyber Serpent

[REQUIREMENT]

name: Cyber Soldier of Darkworld (Rush Duel)
lore: A mechanical soldier that won't stop attacking until all life readings have been extinguished from its sensors.

name: Cyber Stealth Dragon
lore:
You can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 1 face-up "Cyber Dragon".

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
If you have "Cyber Dragon" in your Graveyard, this card gains 2000 DEF and cannot be destroyed by your opponent's monster effects.

name: Cyber Tactical Dragon

"Cyber Assault Dragon" + "Cyber Dragon"

Shuffle 2 LIGHT Attribute Machine Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Destroy up to 2 face-up monsters on your opponent's field, whose total ATK is less than or equal to this card's.

name: Cyber Twin Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore:
"Cyber Dragon" + "Cyber Dragon"

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card can attack twice per turn.

name: Cyber-Stein Frankenshrine
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]

[EFFECT]
Special Summon up to 2 Level 4 or lower Zombie Type Normal Monsters from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Cyber-Tech Alligator (Rush Duel)
lore: Originally a pterodactyl, he was viciously attacked by a dragon. Using the newest technologies, his keeper saved him from near-fatal wounds and brought him back as a powerful Cyborg.

name: Cycliptron
lore: The cornerstone of the dragon tree that houses the providence of creation. As it breaks the absolute limit, it will push to a new unseen territory.

name: Dahlia the Sprouting Shadow Flower
lore: A whimsical flower spirit. Her cheers are small, but full of feelings.

name: Dahut Abyss, Dark Mirror Ruler of the Chair
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle any number of monsters with 0 ATK from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 other face-up monster on either field loses ATK equal to [the number of monsters shuffled into the Deck to meet the requirement] x 300 until the end of this turn. This card gains ATK equal to [the number of monsters shuffled into the Deck to meet the requirement] x 300 until the end of this turn.

name: Dahut, Dark Ruler of the Chair
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the Level of 1 other face-up monster on your field with 0 ATK] x 500 until the end of this turn.

[REQUIREMENT]
You have "Gyakutenno Megami" in your Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card and send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. If you sent a monster to the Graveyard by this effect, you can destroy 2 face-up monsters on your opponent's field with the same Type as that monster.

name: Dark Battle Grounds
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up monsters on the field with 2100 original DEF gain 500 ATK, and if "Gaia The Fierce Knight" or "Gaia the Dragon Champion" attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Dark Factory of Mass Production (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Add 2 Normal Monsters from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Dark Femtron
lore: The source of the draconic tree that is connected to another providence. It conceals infinite branches that lead to an unseen world.

lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Destroy all monsters on the field.

Destroy all monsters on the field. Then, you can add 1 Galaxy Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

Destroy all Spell/Trap Cards on your opponent's field.

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of "Dark Magician" in both players' Graveyards] x 500.

name: Dark Nebula

[REQUIREMENT]
When your DARK Attribute Galaxy Type monster with 1500 or more ATK is destroyed by an opponent's attack.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 DARK Attribute Galaxy Type monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Attack Position. The monster Special Summoned by this effect loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Dark Prophet

[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, shuffle 3 DARK Attribute Galaxy Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Dark Resonance Burst
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Level 6 or higher DARK Attribute Spellcaster Type monster on your field gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have "Dark Magician" or "Dark Magician Girl" face-up on your field, that Level 6 or higher DARK Attribute Spellcaster Type monster gains 1000 more ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Dark Revelation
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack, shuffle 4 Spellcaster Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all Attack Position monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Dark Skeleton Dead Ruler

Send 1 Zombie Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have a Level 7 Zombie Type monster in your Graveyard, inflict 700 damage to your opponent.

name: Dark Sorcerer

name: Dark-Eyes Breakstar Cat
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
If this card attacks a Defense Position monster this turn, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference). Also, if you activated this effect during your Main Phase this card was Special Summoned, you can destroy 1 face-up Level 7 or 8 monster on your opponent's field.

name: Darkglow Angler
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Sea Serpent Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.

Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can add 1 Sea Serpent Type Maximum Monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

If you have 4 or more DARK Attribute monsters with different names in your Graveyard, you can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 1 DARK Attribute monster.

Send 1 DARK Attribute monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all monsters on your opponent's field. Destroy this card during the End Phase of this turn.

[REQUIREMENT]

[EFFECT]
Change 1 face-up monster on either side of the field to face-down Defense Position.

[EFFECT]
Send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. This turn, you can only attack with DARK Attribute Spellcaster Type monsters.

[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a DARK Attribute monster in your Graveyard, send 3 face-up DARK Attribute monsters from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 DARK Attribute monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, if you have 3 DARK Attribute monsters with the same name in your Graveyard, you can draw 1 card.

name: Darkness Road
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up Level 5 or higher DARK Attribute Spellcaster Type monsters on the field gain 400 ATK and lose 1500 DEF.

name: Darkness Rogue
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You Normal Summoned this card this turn and have no other monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 DARK Attribute Spellcaster Type monster from your hand face-up to your field. Then, place this card from your field on the bottom of the Deck.

name: Darkness Zerorogue

[REQUIREMENT]

Destroy all face-up Level 8 or lower monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Daybreak Warrior
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]

Special Summon 1 Level 7 Warrior Type monster from your hand face-up to your field.

[EFFECT]
Set 1 "Dragon's Burst Fusion" or "Dragon's Boost Fusion" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Dead or Arainac
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack.
[EFFECT]
Gain 800 LP. Then, draw 1 card and show it. Then, if that card is a Galaxy Type Normal Monster with 1600 or more ATK, negate the attack.

name: Decennium Mystic Sword
lore: A sword with a soul. Those who wield this sword are encouraged to bide their time and wait to make their move.

name: Deep Sea Dragon Bat Eel

[REQUIREMENT]
Reveal up to 3 Level 10 monsters in your hand.
[EFFECT]
Draw cards equal to [the number of monsters revealed to meet the requirement]. Then, shuffle cards from your hand into the Deck equal to [the number of cards drawn by this effect].

name: Deepsea Hunter

[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has 2 or more monsters on their field.
[EFFECT]
Change up to 2 face-up Level 6 or lower monsters with 1000 or less DEF on your opponent's field to face-down Defense Position.

name: Defender of Dragon Sorcerers
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Spellcaster or Dragon Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 monster on your field cannot be destroyed by an opponent's card effect this turn.

name: Defense Destroying Sword
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up EARTH Attribute Normal Monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up monster with 2000 or more DEF on your opponent's field. Gain 800 LP, and inflict 800 damage to your opponent. This turn, you cannot attack with Effect Monsters.

name: Defrostrooper
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 2 cards of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if your opponent has 5 or more Spell/Trap Cards in their Graveyard, you can add 1 Equip Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Dekorelic Dessert
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 4 Pyro Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
All face-up EARTH Attribute Pyro Type monsters on your field gain 800 ATK until the end of this turn, then gain 800 LP.

name: Delight of the Mighty
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a monster.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Normal Monster on your field gains ATK/DEF equal to [that Normal Summoned monster's Level] x 100 until the end of this turn.

name: Delirium Lampyris

[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has 2 or more monsters on their field, send this face-up card from your field and 1 monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Take control of 1 face-up Level 5-8 monster on your opponent's field with the same Type as the monster sent from your hand to the Graveyard to meet the requirement (move it to your field, and use it yourself).

name: Delirium Papillon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Change this Attack Position card to face-up Defense Position.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field becomes Insect Type this turn. Then, if another face-up Defense Position monster is on the field, you can draw 1 card.

name: Demolisher Wyrm Roar
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a Level 7 or higher monster while you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Normal Monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Destroy that Normal Summoned monster.

name: Demolition Art - Absolute Destruction
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle up to 6 Wyrm Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck. Then, if [the total Levels of the monsters shuffled by this effect] is 16 or higher, you can destroy all Attack Position monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Demolition Barricade
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's Level 8 or lower monster declares an attack while you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Wyrm Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Negate the attack. This turn, your opponent cannot attack with Level 7 or lower monsters.

name: Demolition Charge Dragon Dangerous Blasthamut
lore:
"Demolition Dragon Blasthamut" + "Demolition Soldier Hell Met"

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up card on your field and 1 or 2 monsters on your opponent's field. Then, inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of monsters on your opponent's field that were destroyed by this effect] x 500.

name: Demolition Charge Expert Warning Heavy Shock
lore:
"Demolition Soldier Toby Shock" + "Demolition Soldier Hell Met"

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Level 8 or higher Wyrm Type monster and/or 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, destroy 1 card on your field.

name: Demolition Dragon Blasthamut
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If a card is in a Field Zone, send 2 cards from your hand to the Graveyard, including a Wyrm Type monster.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all face-up Level 8 or lower monsters on your opponent's field. Then, inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of monsters destroyed by this effect] x 300.

name: Demolition Shutter
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up Wyrm Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
While the equipped monster is in Attack Position, it cannot be destroyed by battle. If a card is in a Field Zone, the equipped monster and this card cannot be destroyed by card effects.

name: Demolition Soldier Hell Met
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard, except "Fusion", and pay 500 LP.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, you can add 1 Field Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Demolition Soldier High Kanko
lore: A Demolition Soldier who stands by his convictions. Searching the road to his ideal utopia, he engages in endless construction and demolition.

name: Demolition Soldier Kasetsu Baiten
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Pay 500 LP.
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent a Wyrm Type monster to the Graveyard by this effect, you can add 1 "Demolition Soldier Hell Met" or Level 8 Wyrm Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Demolition Soldier Sakan Yasan
lore: A Demolition Soldier who continues to study and sharpen his skills. In order to build his ideal utopia, he engages in endless construction and demolition.

name: Demolition Soldier Toby Shock
lore: A Demolition Soldier who aims for the top. In order to create his ideal utopia, he engages in endless construction and demolition.

name: Demolition Survey
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Send cards from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard equal to [the number of face-up Wyrm Type monsters on your field]. Then, you can add 1 "Demolition Soldier Hell Met" or Field Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand.

None

2 face-up Reptile Type monsters on your field and 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field lose 1500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Diabearical Lilith

None

lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

1 face-up monster on your field gains ATK equal to [the number of Level 1 monsters in your Graveyard] x 100 until the end of this turn.

name: Dian Keto the Boogie Master
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

Gain 1000 LP.

[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Gain 1000 LP.

[EFFECT]

name: Digger Skipper
lore: A civil engineering machine that excels at excavation. It moves in a bouncing motion to plow the earth.

 This card gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up Celestial Warrior Type monsters on your field] x 1000 until the end of this turn. This turn, this card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters.

name: Dimension Others
lore: A carnivorous space beast that broke its long silence and awoke from a death-like slumber. It drifts across dimensions, invading them one after another.

name: Doctor Red Robe
lore: An expert in combustion research. The fireballs released by his gloves, which are his pride and joy, reduce everything to charcoal.

name: Dogulce Jomont Blanc

name: Dogulce Langue De Shakoki

[REQUIREMENT]

[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Pyro Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

lore: When you're sleeping in the dressing room, you'll feel a bit of sleep paralysis... In the darkness, if you squint your eyes at your bedside...

Destroy 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field with the highest ATK. Draw 1 card and show it. Then, if that card is "Umi" or "Big Umi", inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

name: Dolphin King Iruqua
lore: A dolphin that has braved the stormy seas and hardships of the world, throwing itself headfirst into learning the ways of royalty.

name: Dolphin's Treasure Chest
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 WATER Attribute monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, if your opponent has a face-up Level 7 monster on their field, you can draw 1 additional card.

name: Don A. Corn of the Verdant Vast
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 3 Spell/Trap Cards from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field.

lore: Donpen was born in Antarctica and raised in Tokyo. He recently started Rush Dueling with Donko.Pan Pacific International Holdings Corporation

None

None

Draw 1 card.

 1 face-up Normal Monster on your field can attack twice this turn. Set 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Double-Doom Dragon

[REQUIREMENT]

name: Douma the Talismanic Supreme Sage

1 face-up Plant Type monster on your field can attack directly this turn. Then, you can Set 1 "Shadow Flower Stance" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Dragon Bird
lore: A mysterious creature often thought to be a species of bird, but it is actually something completely different. It seems to be strong for a bird, so perhaps it is a dragon?

name: Dragon Double-Doom
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you have a face-up High Dragon or Dragon Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
You choose which of your monsters becomes the attack target for your opponent's attack. Then, if you have 2 or more face-up monsters with the same name on your field, you can destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field.

name: Dragon Encounter

[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Dragon Type monster from your hand face-up to your field.

name: Dragon Knight of Darkness
lore: A dragon knight leading a dark army. His merciless attacks have unparalleled strength, and the cursed sword he wields devours the souls of his foes and makes him stronger.

name: Dragon Merchant
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Level 6 or lower Dragon Type monster on your field gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Fusion Summon by sending face-up Dragon Type monsters from your field to the Graveyard as material. Then, if you sent "Red Boot Boost Dragon" to the Graveyard by this effect, you can send the top 7 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent a card from the Deck to the Graveyard, you can send the top 7 cards of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard.

lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None

Draw 1 card.

Change face-down Defense Position monsters on your opponent's field to face-up Attack Position, up to [the number of face-up Machine Type monsters on your field]. The original ATK of the monsters changed to face-up Attack Position by this effect become 0 until the end of this turn.

Maximum Mode

lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of cards in your Graveyard] x 100.

name: Echeclus the Star Knight
lore: A man who carries the power of an evil star. He charges across the battlefield each day, filled with faith in his own sense of justice.

name: Eclipse
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None

Destroy 1 face-up monster on your field and 1 face-up monster with the same Level on your opponent's field.

None

 Inflict 1500 damage to your opponent. Draw 3 cards. Then, send 2 cards from your hand to the Graveyard.

name: Engage and Strike!

When an opponent's monster declares an attack.

name: Engine Reviver

name: Ensembullfighter the Music Fiend

name: Esperade the Smashing Superstar

[EFFECT]
Destroy up to 2 monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Estrome the Mega Monarch
lore:
You can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 1 face-up Level 5 or higher monster with 1000 DEF.

[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Tribute Summoned this card in Attack Position.
[EFFECT]
Your opponent chooses 1 card on their field, and you destroy 1 other card on either field.

name: Estrome the Star Monarch
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Tribute Summoned this card in Attack Position.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Level 6 or lower Effect Monster on your opponent's field.

name: Eternal Freeze
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a monster with 2500 or more ATK, send 1 monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Place that Normal Summoned monster on the bottom of the owner's Deck.

name: Eternal Galactica Oblivion
lore:
"Galactica Oblivion" + 2 LIGHT Attribute Galaxy Type monsters

[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 5 Galaxy Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. This turn, this card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects. Then, you can make this card gain ATK equal to [the number of monsters in your Graveyard] x 300 until the end of this turn.

name: Ether Escape
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a Level 7 or higher monster, shuffle 2 Warrior and/or Machine Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Change that Normal Summoned monster to face-down Defense Position. Then, if you have a face-up Fusion Monster on your field, you can place 1 face-down card from your opponent's field on top of the owner's Deck.

name: Ether Fast Striker
lore:
"Ether Seeker" + "Ether Finder"

[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard on either the top or bottom of your Deck.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 600 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can place 1 Normal Monster from your Graveyard on top of your Deck.

name: Ether Finder
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Spell/Trap Card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your field gains 300 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if "Fusion" is in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 "Ether Seeker" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Ether Seeker
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Spell/Trap Card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 300 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have "Fusion" in your Graveyard, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Ethyl the Flame Jinn of the Lamp
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no other monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Methyl the Flame Jinn of the Lamp" from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position.

name: Etraynze the Shadow Flower Ninja
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have "Etraynze the Shadow Flower Ninja" in your Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Send 1 Plant Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard. Then, Special Summon 1 "Etraynze the Shadow Flower Ninja" from your Graveyard face-up to your field, but place it on the bottom of the Deck during the End Phase. This turn, this card cannot attack directly.

name: Eve of the Big March
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Reveal 1 Level 7 or higher Beast Type monster in your hand.
[EFFECT]
Excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck. You can Special Summon up to 2 excavated Level 4 or lower Beast Type monsters to your field in face-down Defense Position. Send the remaining cards to the Graveyard.

name: Evil Star Beacon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no Attack Position monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 2 LIGHT Attribute Fiend Type Normal Monsters whose total Levels equal 10 or less, from your Graveyard in face-up Attack Position to your field. This turn, you can only attack with Fiend Type monsters.

name: Evolution Rush Burst
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 5 or higher Machine Type monster on your field, shuffle 5 LIGHT Attribute Machine Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 card on your opponent's field.

name: Ewekai - Grudges from the Grave
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your Attack Position Beast Type Normal Monster, send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
The attack target loses 2000 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can add up to 4 cards sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement to your hand.

name: Ewekai Airaries
lore: The easy-breezy vagabond sheep at Ewekai Ranch. It doesn't concern itself with the usual hustle and bustle on the ranch.

name: Ewekai Aquasheep
lore: The most easy-going sheep at Ewekai Ranch. It never panics and watches things unfold without ever making a fuss.

name: Ewekai Grounmouton
lore: A new face around the Ewekai Ranch. It refuses to work much like dirt.

name: Ewekai Nightmutton
lore: A shy lamb of the Ewekai Ranch. It's always quietly in a corner.

name: Ewekai Planeau
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Beast Type Normal Monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Set 1 "Meet and Greed" or 1 "Ewekai - Grudges from the Grave" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone. Then, if you have a face-up "Magical Sheep Girl Meeeg-chan" on your field, you can gain 600 LP.

name: Ewekai Pyrowool
lore: A senior of the Ewekai Ranch. Its hot-blooded coaching makes those around it avoid it like smoke.

name: Ewekai Thunderlambda
lore: The sharpest sheep at Ewekai Ranch. It keeps a close eye on its friends' every move.

name: Ewekai Waveschaf
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Gain 200 LP. Then, if you have Beast Type Normal Monsters with 3 or more different Attributes in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 "Magical Sheep Girl Meeeg-chan" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Excutie Break!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack, place 1 face-up Level 6 monster with 500 DEF from your field on either the top or bottom of the owner's Deck.
[EFFECT]
Negate the attack. Then, if you have a face-up Level 6 monster with 500 DEF on your field, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Excutie Catch!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster face-up while you have a face-up Level 6 monster with 500 DEF on your field.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field to face-down Defense Position.

name: Excutie Emergency!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a face-up Level 6 monster on your field is destroyed by an opponent's attack or their card effect and you have no other monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 6 monster with 500 DEF from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, you can destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field.

name: Excutie Feena
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a face-up monster with 1700 or more ATK on their field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
All face-up monsters on your field gain 200 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Excutie Fermi
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Normal Monster on your field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Excutie Flame
lore:
If your opponent has a face-up Level 6 or higher monster on their field, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up Level 6 or higher monsters on the field] x 600 until the end of this turn. This turn, you can only attack with this card.

name: Excutie Floa
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Level 6 non-WATER Attribute monster with 500 DEF from your Graveyard to your hand. This turn, your Level 7 or higher monsters cannot attack.

name: Excutie Leir
lore:
If you have a face-up Level 6 monster with 500 DEF on your field, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
Face-up Level 7 or higher monsters on the field lose 300 ATK/DEF.

name: Excutie Lilius
lore:
If you have a face-up Level 6 monster with 500 DEF on your field, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
Your Level 7 or higher monsters cannot attack.

name: Excutie Lucy
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 Level 6 monster with 500 DEF from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Change the battle position of 1 monster on your opponent's field (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position).

name: Excutie Lumiere
lore:
If you have no monsters on your field, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Shuffle 1 face-up Level 6 monster on your field and 1 face-up Level 7 or 8 monster on your opponent's field into the owners' Decks. This turn, your Level 7 or higher monsters cannot attack.

name: Excutie Prouty
lore:
You can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field by revealing 1 other Level 6 monster with 500 DEF in your hand.

[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Gain 500 LP.

name: Excutie Ram
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Level 6 monster with 500 DEF from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field. This turn, your Level 7 or higher monsters cannot attack.

name: Excutie Riding!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons an Effect Monster face-up.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 monster with ATK less than or equal to that monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Attack Position. Then, you can make up to 2 face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose 1800 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Excutie Scout!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 4 Level 6 monsters with 500 DEF and different names from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Draw 2 cards. This turn, your Level 7 or higher monsters cannot attack.

name: Excutie Scramble!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 6 monster with 500 DEF from your hand or your Graveyard face-up to your field. This turn, your Level 7 or higher monsters cannot attack.

name: Excutie Up!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Choose 2 face-up monsters with different Types on your field. This turn, the chosen monsters can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a monster in Attack Position. If you have a face-up Level 6 monster with 500 DEF on your field, inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

name: Explosive Rage
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 2 Reptile Type monsters from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field with an equal or lower Level than [the total Level of the monsters sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement].

name: ExPress Train
lore: A train that uses news tips as fuel and runs on the rails of getting scoops. Its fact-gathering and writing are very streamlined!

name: Extra Spice the Elite Noodle Ninja
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 face-up  Pyro Type Normal Monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. Draw 1 card.

name: EXTRAplorer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 300 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have 5 or more Galaxy Type monsters in your Graveyard, you can add 1 Galaxy Type Normal Monster and/or 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Fairy Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore: This beautiful Dragon spirit harbors hidden strength.

name: Faith Bird (Rush Duel)
lore: This long-tailed bird blinds its enemies with mystical light.

name: Fantasia Strike Dragon Miragiastar F
lore:
"Illusion Strike Dragon Miragias" + "The Dragon"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[MULTI-CHOICE EFFECT]
 Up to 3 face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose 1500 ATK until the end of this turn. This turn, this card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters. This turn, this card can attack directly.

name: Fantasy Ladybug Pastel
lore: A kindhearted ladybug whose trademark is the heart on its back. It is said that if you touch it, your love will come true.

name: Faulty Fire
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a Spell/Trap Card(s) on your field is destroyed by an opponent's card effect.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Level 6 or lower Effect Monster on your opponent's field.

name: Fearstute Followl
lore:
"Followl of the Fornether" + "Followl of the Dark Wisdom"

[REQUIREMENT]
During your Main Phase that you Fusion Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Fiend Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Featuring Omega
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Special Summons a monster.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Omega Psychic or Psychic Type monster on your field gains 1200 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if that monster's Level is 9, it cannot be destroyed by battle or your opponent's card effects this turn.

name: Femtron
lore: The source of the draconic tree that holds the secret of all providence. When assailed by microcosm and macrocosm, the world will be guided to a new domain.

name: Fenrirewritter Sol
lore:
"Sigilstate Sol" + "Connector Dog"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, if your opponent has a monster on their field, you can Special Summon 1 Cyberse Type monster from your hand face-up to your field.

name: Feral Imp (Rush Duel)
lore: A playful little fiend that lurks in the dark, waiting to attack an unwary enemy.

name: Feverous Spirit Stadium
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up FIRE Attribute monsters on your field gain 400 ATK during your turn only, and face-up FIRE Attribute monsters on your opponent's field gain 400 ATK during their turn only.

name: Fiery Blaze
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 2 or more face-up Pyro Type monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 300 damage to your opponent. Then, if you inflicted damage to your opponent by this effect, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Fiery Infernleon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your LP are lower than your opponent's, pay 600 LP.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if a Reptile Type monster(s) is among the cards sent, you can Special Summon 1 Level 6 or lower Reptile Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Fillan Dwarf
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can place 1 Spell/Trap Card from your opponent's Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck.

name: Final Destiny (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 5 cards from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all cards on the field.

name: Finalize Phoenix
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has 2 or more face-up monsters on their field, shuffle 4 Pyro Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon up to 2 Pyro Type Effect Monsters from your Graveyard face-up to your field, whose total Levels equal [the total Levels of the face-up monsters on your opponent's field].

name: Fire Fall Blaze Barrier
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's Level 8 or lower monster declares an attack while you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Pyro Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, all face-up Level 8 or lower monsters on your opponent's field lose ATK equal to [the number of Pyro Type monsters sent to the Graveyard by this effect] x 400 until the end of this turn.

name: Fire Golem
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Pay 600 LP.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 600 DEF until the end of this turn.

name: Fire Guardian
lore: The gatekeeper standing watch over the path to the Fire Dragon Kingdom. Those who cannot withstand its breath do not have the right to go past it.

name: Fire Jester
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 5 or higher LIGHT Attribute monster on your field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field loses 500 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.

name: Fireyarou (Rush Duel)
lore: A malevolent creature wrapped in flames that attacks enemies with intense fire.

name: Five Types of Assistance
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Warrior, Fairy, Beast, Winged Beast, or Reptile Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Up to 2 face-up monsters on your field cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects this turn.

name: Five-Headed Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore:
5 Dragon Type monsters
Must be Fusion Summoned.

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card cannot be destroyed by battle with a DARK, EARTH, WATER, FIRE, or WIND Attribute monster.

name: Flame Arms - Fretberge
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up monster on your field whose original Type is Psychic.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains 400 ATK. While the equipped monster is face-up on your field, your opponent cannot declare an attack on monsters that are not equipped with an Equip Spell Card.

name: Flame Cerebrus (Rush Duel)
lore: Known to many as the "Burning Executioner", this monster is capable of burning enemies to cinders.

name: Flame Champion (Rush Duel)
lore: A warrior protected by a flaming shield that nullifies any attack.

name: Flame Manipulator (Rush Duel)
lore: This Spellcaster attacks enemies with fire-related spells such as "Sea of Flames" and "Wall of Fire".

name: Flame Ruler (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This face-up card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a FIRE Attribute monster in Attack Position.

name: Flame Seeker
lore: Team "Firepower Max" Sub-Leader. Recently, he's been using an ultra-high-power burner that he bought using everything he owns. LET'S FIRE!

name: Flame Swordsman (Rush Duel)
lore: "Flame Manipulator" + "Masaki the Legendary Swordsman"

name: Flapun
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have another face-up Beast Type monster on your field, place 1 Beast Type monster from your Graveyard on top of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 400 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Flare Sorcerer
lore: A magician with burning passion. His feelings eventually burned up his own heart.

name: Flutomahawk the Music Princess
lore: The vanguard of the band. She creates beautiful melodies by swinging her axes through the air. Some believe she chooses her outfit to hide her weaponry, but it's just because she gets cold easily.

name: Flying Kamakiri #2 (Rush Duel)
lore: A flying mantis that feeds primarily on insects.

name: Folder Blitz the Infinite Dream
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent's LP are at least 2000 higher than yours.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 1500 damage to the opponent.

name: Following World
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up WIND Attribute Normal Monsters on the field gain 500 ATK.

name: Followl of the Dark Wisdom
lore: A researcher of the nature of darkness. He serves a king who seeks to conquer the continent, but his true aims are unknown.

name: Followl of the Fornether
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 3 Fiend Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Force of Thief
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a card in your Spell & Trap Zone is destroyed by an opponent's card effect.
[EFFECT]
Set up to 2 Spell/Trap Cards from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone. Then, you can choose up to 3 face-up Level 7 or higher Psychic Type monsters on your field. If you do, those monsters cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.

name: Forest (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up Insect, Beast, Plant, and Beast-Warrior Type monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

name: Forkhawk
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have 3 face-up Machine Type monsters on your field, send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 face-down monster on your opponent's field to face-up Attack Position.

name: Fortitude Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster with 2000 or more ATK on your opponent's field loses 400 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can Set 1 "Dragon's Fortitude" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Frenzied Panda (Rush Duel)
lore: A savage beast that carries a big bamboo stick for beating down its enemies.

name: Frenzied Panda Cotta
lore: A savage panda store clerk. It completely snaps when someone orders panna cotta.

name: Frightening Fan Mail
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has cards in their hand, change all Attack Position Zombie Type Normal Monsters on your field to face-up Defense Position.
[EFFECT]
Send random cards from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard, up to [the number of face-up Defense Position Zombie Type monsters on your field]. Then, inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of cards sent to the Graveyard by this effect] x 300.

name: Full Jersey
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack, pay 500 LP.
[EFFECT]
All face-up monsters with 500 DEF on your field gain 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Full Meteor Impact
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Spellcaster Type monster on your field during the turn you Normal Summoned this card, send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all face-up Level 6 or higher monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Full Moon Dragon Umbralancer F
lore:
"Dragon Knight of Darkness" + "Dragon Bat"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard, except "Fusion".
[MULTI-CHOICE EFFECT]
 Special Summon 1 High Dragon Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Add 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Full Orchestra the Music Fiend
lore:
"Ensembullfighter the Music Fiend" + "Boton the Music Princess"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all face-down cards in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone. Then, this card gains ATK equal to [the number of cards destroyed by this effect] x 600 until the end of this turn.

name: Fusion (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Fusion Summon by sending face-up monsters from your field to the Graveyard as material.

name: Fusionic Revivern
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During your Main Phase that you Fusion Summoned a monster, send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, you can Special Summon 1 High Dragon Type Fusion Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, if you Special Summoned a monster by this effect, you can add 1 "Fusion" or "Polymerization" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Future Aeromancer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, shuffle 2 WIND Attribute monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can add 1 Equip Spell Card from among the cards sent to the Graveyard by this effect to your hand.

name: Future Diviner
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Level 7 or higher Psychic Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card, then send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

name: Future Mining
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has 2 or more face-up monsters on their field.
[EFFECT]
Excavate the top 2 cards of your Deck. You can add 1 excavated monster to your hand. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: Gadget Soldier (Rush Duel)
lore: A rust-free machine warrior born to battle.

name: Gagaga Outfielder
lore: An enchanting baseball warrior overflowing with guts who excels at defense and unexpected batting. Known as the Magician of the Fence, he's the type who stays in your memory for things besides his records.

name: Gagagaguts
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a monster on your field is destroyed by an opponent's card effect.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 FIRE Attribute monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position. Then, if you Special Summoned "Player #39: Home Run Hitter" or "Player #99: Grand Slam Dragon" by this effect, you can destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field.

name: Gaia the Battle Ruler
lore:
"Gaia The Fierce Knight" + "Curse of Dragon"

[REQUIREMENT]
During your Main Phase this card was Special Summoned, shuffle 1 non-Magical Knight Type monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[MULTI-CHOICE EFFECT]
 This turn, this card can attack directly. Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Gaia the Dragon Champion (Rush Duel)
lore: "Gaia The Fierce Knight" + "Curse of Dragon"

name: Gaia The Fierce Knight (Rush Duel)
lore: A knight whose horse travels faster than the wind. His battle-charge is a force to be reckoned with.

name: Gajumaru the Shadow Flower Lion
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 other face-up EARTH Attribute Plant Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change the original ATK of 1 face-up Level 8 or lower EARTH Attribute monster on your opponent's field to 0 until the end of this turn.

name: Galacterial Ore
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 3 or more Galaxy Type monsters in your Graveyard during your Main Phase this card was Normal or Special Summoned.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 "Galactica Xiphos" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Galactiara Eve
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have no other monsters on your field, send 1 Galaxy Type monster with 1600 or more ATK from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Send this card from your field to the Graveyard and draw 1 card. Then, if you have 3 or less monsters in your Graveyard, draw 1 card.

name: Galactiara Fuse Eve
lore:
"Galactiara Eve" + 1 LIGHT Attribute Galaxy Type monster

[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard on either the top or bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, you can Special Summon 1 Galaxy Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Galactica Addergatling
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up Galaxy Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains 200 ATK/DEF and cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

name: Galactica Amnesia
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 2 Level 6 or lower Galaxy Type Normal Monsters from your Graveyard face-up to your field. This turn, you can only attack with Galaxy Type monsters.

name: Galactica Deja Vu
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent's LP are 4000 or higher, send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent a Level 4 or lower LIGHT Attribute Galaxy Type Normal Monster to the Graveyard by this effect, you can Special Summon that monster face-up to your field. Then, inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the original ATK of the monster Special Summoned by this effect].

name: Galactica Force
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 3 Galaxy Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
All face-up Galaxy Type Normal Monsters on your field gain ATK equal to [the number of face-up Normal Monsters on the field] x 300 until the end of this turn.

name: Galactica Jamais Vu
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have no other monsters on your field during the turn you Normal Summoned this card, shuffle 2 Spell Cards from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card.

name: Galactica Lattice
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster.
[EFFECT]
Change up to 3 Attack Position Galaxy Type Normal Monsters on your field to face-up Defense Position. Then, all face-up monsters on your field gain DEF equal to [the number of face-up Galaxy Type monsters on your field] x 500 until the end of this turn.

name: Galactica Oblivion
lore: War To Zen! Awesome True Goodnight!

name: Galactica Reminiscence
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 Trap Card from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
All face-up Galaxy Type monsters on your field gain 400 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have "Galactica Oblivion" face-up on your field, you can make all face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Galactica Repulsion
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 3 face-up Galaxy Type Normal Monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Return 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster from your opponent's field to the owner's hand.

name: Galactica Tabula Rasa
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Spell Card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Return 1 card from your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone to the owner's hand. Then, you can make 1 face-up Level 7 or lower monster with 2500 or more ATK on your opponent's field lose 2500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Galactica Xiphos
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a face-up Level 7 or 8 monster on their field, equip this card to 1 face-up Galaxy Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up Normal Monsters on your field] x 300. If the equipped monster is "Galactica Oblivion", it gains 1000 more ATK.

name: Galaxy Topping Troll
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If "Outer Space" is face-up on the field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 600 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Gameboard Ablaze and Alight
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Up to 3 face-up Effect Monsters on your opponent's field lose 400 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn. Then, if your LP are lower than your opponent's, you can Special Summon 1 Level 7 monster from your hand face-up to your field.

name: Garland the True Shadow Flower Ninja
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 Plant Type monster from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 or lower Plant Type monster from your hand face-up to your field, but place it on the bottom of the Deck during the End Phase.

name: Garmr the Lone Wolf
lore: A beast that has refused divine protection, exchanging tranquility for freedom.

name: Garnecia Elefantis (Rush Duel)
lore: A monster so heavy that each step rocks the earth.

name: Gatekeeping Gargoyle
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Increase the Level of 1 face-up monster on your field by 1 until the end of this turn.

name: Gatling the Shadow Flower Shinobi
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 2 Plant Type Normal Monsters from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy up to 2 Attack Position Level 8 or lower monsters on your opponent's field. Then, inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of monsters destroyed by this effect] x 500. This turn, you can only attack with 1 monster.

name: Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts (Rush Duel)
lore: This monster moves so fast that it looks like an illusion to mortal eyes.

name: Gekka the Shadow Flower Beauty
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, pay 500 LP.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 EARTH Attribute Plant Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Genie's Fire Breath
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Fiend Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Return 1 Spell/Trap Card from your opponent's field to the owner's hand.

name: Geological Survey
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Excavate cards from the top of your Deck equal to [the number of cards on the opponent's field]. Then, place the excavated cards on either the top or bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: Ghost Cyclone
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field. Then, if you have 3 or less monsters in your Graveyard, you can draw 1 card.

name: Ghost Vicious
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have another face-up Level 5 Zombie Type monster on your field, pay 500 LP.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Level 5 Zombie Type monster on your field can attack twice during this turn.

name: Ghoulish Gal
lore: In the men's bathroom down in the basement, you'll suddenly feel a presence behind your back. But you know, you should absolutely not turn back until you've finished your business. If you happen to look back and end up seeing that monster...

name: Gi-ant Revolution
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent's monster declares an attack while you have 3 face-up Insect Type monsters with 100 or less ATK on your field.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all face-up Level 8 or lower monsters  on your opponent's field.

name: Giant Bulge
lore: A space weapon that has a similar structure to a spiral galaxy. It attacks with its tentacles that it can move at will. Wajaa!

name: Giant Tiger Strike
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack, return 1 face-up Level 7 or higher WIND Attribute monster from your field to the owner's hand.
[EFFECT]
Change the attacking monster to face-up Defense Position. Then, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

name: Giant Tortoise of Greed
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a monster.
[EFFECT]
Draw 2 cards.

name: Giftarist
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of other face-up Psychic Type monsters on your field] x 400 until the end of this turn.

name: Giga-Tech Wolf (Rush Duel)
lore: An iron wolf with razor-sharp fangs that can penetrate any armor.

name: Gilford the Legend (Rush Duel)
lore:
This card cannot be Special Summoned.

[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Equip up to 3 Equip Spell Cards from your Graveyard to a face-up Warrior Type monster(s) on your field.

name: Gilford the Lightning (Rush Duel)
lore:
You can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 3 monsters.

[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card by Tributing 3 monsters.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Gilford the Rising
lore:
This card cannot be Special Summoned.

[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, shuffle 2 Warrior Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
This turn, this card can make up to 3 attacks on monsters.

name: Gingangel, the Deluxe Sushi Fairy
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent's LP are 4000 or higher, send 2 cards from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Inflict damage equal to [the ATK of 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field] to your opponent. This turn, you can only attack with this card.

name: Goblin Holedigger Captain
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have "The Warrior Returning Alive" or "Trap Hole" in your Graveyard, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses ATK equal to [the total number of "The Warrior Returning Alive" and "Trap Hole" in your Graveyard] x 1000 until the end of this turn.

name: Goddess of Whimsy
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has a monster on their field.
[EFFECT]
Toss a coin. If the result is heads, this card gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn. If the result is tails, send this card from your field to the Graveyard and draw 1 card.

name: Gogogo Umpire
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 "Feverous Spirit Stadium" from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 FIRE Attribute Normal Monster with 400 DEF from your Graveyard face-up to your field. This turn, you can only attack with FIRE Attribute monsters.

name: Gokibore (Rush Duel)
lore: A large, spherical roach that attacks its enemies by rolling over them.

name: Gold Rush
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a Level 7 or higher monster face-up, send all monsters from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 3 cards and show them. Then, if a Level 7 or higher monster is among them, you can Special Summon any number of those Level 7 or higher monsters to your field in face-down Defense Position.

name: Golden-Eyes Star Cat
lore: A star cat with eyes of gold. They're filled with charm.

name: Grace Princess Kana
lore: Say, "Ahh!"

name: Graceful Charity (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Draw 3 cards. Then, send 2 cards from your hand to the Graveyard.

name: Gracesaurus
lore: A gentle dinosaur that doesn't like conflict. It's always gracefully watching the audience.

name: Grand Extreme
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Fish or Sea Serpent Type monster from your hand face-up to your field. Then, shuffle up to 5 monsters from the opponent's Graveyard into their Deck.

name: Grand Tiki Elder (Rush Duel)
lore: A masked monster that wields the most deadly of curses.

name: Grass
lore: Lol, weeds

name: Gravity Plus Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your field gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up Dragon Type Normal Monsters on your field] x 400 until the end of this turn.

name: Gravity Press Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 700 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.

name: Great Cosmonarch
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 800 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Great Maju Garzett (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the original ATK of 1 monster Tributed for the Tribute Summon of this card in Attack Position] x 2.

name: Great Multistrike Dragon Dragias Burst
lore:
You can Maximum Summon this card together with "Great Multistrike Dragon Dragias Burst [L]" and "Great Multistrike Dragon Dragias Burst [R]".

[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

name: Great Multistrike Dragon Dragias Burst [L]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card can make 3 attacks on monsters this turn. Shuffle this card into the Deck during the End Phase of this turn.

name: Great Multistrike Dragon Dragias Burst [R]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode: Send 3 cards from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This turn, this card gains 1000 ATK, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Great-Tusked Mammoth
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Until the end of the opponent's next turn, while this card is face-up, neither player can activate the effects of face-up Level 4 or lower monsters.

name: Green-Eyes Star Cat
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Beast or Warrior Type monster with 200 DEF from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, if you sent a Normal Monster to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, this face-up card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a monster with 200 DEF in Attack Position this turn.

name: Greystorm Reverie
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 other card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if no Spell/Trap Cards are on the field, this card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters this turn.

name: Griffore (Rush Duel)
lore: This monster's tough hide deflects almost any attack.

name: Grilled Pangolin
lore: A creature dwelling in a caldera, living at its own pace. While it remains calm, the flames covering its body cause everything around it to catch fire, turning the surrounding area into a sea of flames.

name: Ground Attacker Bugroth (Rush Duel)
lore: A surface battle robot that was once used for sea warfare.

name: Ground Cerberus
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of face-up EARTH Attribute Machine Type monsters on your field] x 300.

name: Groundmaster Bathynomus
lore: A mysterious life form from the ocean floor. It is said legendary sea serpents dwell in its habitat.

name: Guarding Mermaid
lore: A fierce mermaid that torments the damned who fell to hell. She has a great reputation of making recidivists beg "I will never do anything bad again, please forgive me".

name: Guide of the Blaze Fiends
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no other monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Maximum Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. This turn, you can only attack with Maximum Monsters.

name: Gust (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a Spell Card on your field is destroyed by an opponent's card effect.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on either side of the field.

name: Gyakutenno Megami (Rush Duel)
lore: This fairy uses her mystical power to protect the weak and provide spiritual support.

name: H.D.D. - Hundred Divine Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
If you would normal draw until you have 5 cards in your hand during your Draw Phase, normal draw until you have 6 cards in your hand instead.

name: Hacking Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Dragon Type monster from your hand to your opponent's field in face-up Defense Position. Then, you can return 1 Level 8 or lower Attack Position monster from your opponent's field to the owner's hand.

name: Hallowed Light Sorcerer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Pay 300 LP.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses ATK equal to [the number of face-up LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monsters on your field] x 300 until the end of this turn.

name: Hammer Crush
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Hampering Hippo
lore: An unexpectedly fast hippopotamus that pushes back against every attack. It can even use its treads to swim skillfully.

name: Handsray Destleo
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Send up to 2 random cards from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard.

name: Handy Lady
lore: A jack-of-all-trades who'll take on any job, whether it be looking for lost cats to serving as a bodyguard for VIPs. Recently, she's been doing nothing but lunch delivery gigs, but one day, she received a message from an unknown sender.

name: Haniwaffle
lore: A dish created in order to stop a food crisis. A shrill voice shrieks from its sweet tasting mask.

name: Hardefense Mission
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's Level 8 or lower monster with 2500 or more original ATK declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
Destroy the attacking monster.

name: Harpie Carla
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Set 1 "Harpie's Full Dress" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Harpie Girl (Rush Duel)
lore: A Harpie chick who aspires to flit about beautifully and gorgeously, but attack sharply.

name: Harpie Ladies
lore:
You can Maximum Summon this card together with "Harpie Ladies [L]" and "Harpie Ladies [R]".

[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 WIND Attribute Winged Beast Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your field gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if this card is in Maximum Mode, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

name: Harpie Ladies [L]
lore:
This card's name becomes "Harpie Ladies" while in the Graveyard.

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card's name becomes "Harpie Ladies" and it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects. Then, if this card is in Maximum Mode, increase its Level by 5.

name: Harpie Ladies [R]
lore:
This card's name becomes "Harpie Ladies" while in the Graveyard.

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card's name becomes "Harpie Ladies" and it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's monster effects. Then, if this card is in Maximum Mode, it can make up to 3 attacks on monsters each turn.

name: Harpie Lady (Rush Duel)
lore: This human-shaped animal with wings is beautiful to watch but deadly in battle.

name: Harpie Lady 1 (Rush Duel)
lore:
This card's name becomes "Harpie Lady" while in the Graveyard.

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card's name becomes "Harpie Lady", and face-up WIND Attribute monsters on the field gain 300 ATK.

name: Harpie Lady 2 (Rush Duel)
lore:
This card's name becomes "Harpie Lady" while in the Graveyard.

[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card's name becomes "Harpie Lady", and your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards when this card declares an attack.

name: Harpie Lady 3 (Rush Duel)
lore:
This card's name becomes "Harpie Lady" while in the Graveyard.

[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card's name becomes "Harpie Lady" until the end of your opponent's next turn. Then, you can choose 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field. If you do, your opponent cannot attack with that monster during their next turn.

name: Harpie Regina
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have another face-up WIND Attribute Winged Beast Type monster on your field, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, if you have a face-up Normal Monster on your field, you can add 1 "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Ladies" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Harpie's Feather Tempest
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a monster, shuffle 2 "Harpie Lady" and/or "Harpie Ladies" from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Destroy that Normal Summoned monster. Then, if you shuffled a Normal Monster into the Deck to meet the requirement, you can change the battle position of 1 monster on your opponent's field (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position).

name: Harpie's Full Dress
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Ladies" on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains 800 ATK and 400 DEF. If you have 1 or 3 face-up monsters on your field, the equipped monster inflicts piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference), if it attacks a Defense Position monster.

name: Harpie's Pet Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up "Harpie Lady" on the field] x 300 and [the number of face-up "Harpie Ladies" on the field] x 900.

name: Headbutt Cachalot
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have "Umi" or "Big Umi" face-up on your field, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

name: Headhunters' Digmole
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have 10 or more monsters in your Graveyard, shuffle 3 Beast-Warrior Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 800 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Headhunters' Jaguar
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle 2 monsters from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck, including a Normal Monster.

name: Heartless Hound Apex Katana Danbiramatian
lore: The apex of the Heartless Hounds who presides over his clumsy so-so subordinates. His proficiency is quite woofderful.

name: Heartless Hound Blade Aikuchihuahua
lore: A Heartless Hound that catches its enemies off guard with its large and round cute eyes, causing them to leave their purses, pockets, and wallets unguarded. His loyalty is... so-so.

name: Heartless Hound Blade Bulldosu
lore: A Heartless Hound who threatens with a throaty deep voice. His ability to intimidate others is... so-so.

name: Heartless Hound Blaster Chaka Chow Chow
lore: A scary Heartless Hound who usually isn't so scary, until he really gets angry. His determination is... so-so.

name: Heartless Hound Blaster Gundog
lore: A Heartless Hound who fights all his foes with a water pistol. The trust of his allies is... so-so.

name: Heartless Hound Martial Master Shiba
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During your Main Phase that you Normal or Special Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 5-7 Beast-Warrior Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Heartless Hound Striking Kai Ken Knuckle
lore: A young Heartless Hound who is extremely motivated, but also pretty reckless. The strength of his grip is... so-so.

name: Heartless Hound Thunder Emperor Drainu
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you activated this effect during your Main Phase that you Normal or Special Summoned this card, you can Special Summon 1 Level 6 or lower Beast-Warrior Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Heat Dartfish
lore: A fish with a proboscis that heats up when attacking. Its mild flavor makes it a true delicacy.

name: Heat Hyena
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no other monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Send cards from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard equal to [the number of monsters on your opponent's field].

name: Heaven Gancel
lore: A spirit dragon entrusted with the feelings and dreams of the unsullied stars. It attacks by resonating with a pure heart. N'gorudu Guai!

name: Heavenly Gift
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Send any number of monsters from your hand to the Graveyard. If [the total Levels of those monsters sent to the Graveyard by this effect] is 10 or higher, you can draw 2 cards.

name: Heavenly Invitation
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you have no monsters on your field, you can add 1 Level 10 monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Heavenly Rest
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a monster(s) on your field is destroyed by an opponent's attack or their card effect and you have no other monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field to face-down Defense Position. Then, if the original Level of the destroyed monster is 10, you can destroy 1 face-down card on your opponent's field.

name: Heavenly Revelation
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Send any number of monsters from your field to the Graveyard. Then, if [the total original Levels of those monsters sent to the Graveyard by this effect] is 10 or higher, you can Special Summon 1 Level 8 or lower monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. The monster Special Summoned by this effect gains 300 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Heavenly Selection
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
The total Levels of the face-up monsters on your field are 10 or higher.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field. Then, if you have 1 face-up monster on your field, you can make 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field lose 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Heavy Arms - Double Nexcalibur
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 WIND Attribute Psychic Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard, and equip this card to 1 face-up Psychic Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster can attack twice per turn.

name: Heavy Cavalry Starter
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
