When your opponent Normal Summons a Level 5 or higher monster.
[EFFECT]
Change the battle position of 1 face-up Machine Type monster on your field (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position). If you do, that monster on your field gains 1500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Heavy Cavalry Tactics
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 face-up EARTH Attribute Machine Type Normal Monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 EARTH Attribute Machine Type Effect Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. This turn, you can only attack with the monster Special Summoned by this effect.

name: Heavy Roller
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 FIRE Attribute monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, if a face-up Field Spell Card is on the field, you can draw 1 additional card.

name: Heavy Storm (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Destroy all Spell/Trap Cards on the field.

name: Hebe the Star Vassal
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, shuffle 2 monsters with 1000 DEF from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Your opponent Special Summons 1 Level 6 or lower Effect Monster from their Graveyard to their field in face-up Defense Position. Then, you can add 1 Level 5 or higher monster with 1000 DEF from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Heel Healer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Gain 1000 LP.

name: Helmet of the Master Craftsman
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains 200 ATK/DEF. Then, if the equipped monster is "Master Craftsman Kotetsu" or a Legend monster whose original Level is 4 or lower, it gains ATK equal to [its original ATK].

name: Hermit's Soul
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your face-up monster with 0 ATK.
[EFFECT]
Change the attacking monster to face-up Defense Position. If you do, Special Summon 1 Normal Monster with 0 ATK from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Hero of the Assist
lore:
"Hero of the Yeast" + "Hero of the Yeast"

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Hero of the East (Rush Duel)
lore: Feel da strength ah dis sword-swingin' samurai from da Far East.

name: Hero of the Sweep
lore:
"Hero of the Yeast" + "One Year Broom"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains ATK/DEF equal to [the number of face-up EARTH Attribute monsters on your field] x 200 until the end of this turn.

name: Hero of the Yeast
lore: A samurai from the Far East. His knife easily slices through bread.

name: High-Heel Priestess
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You Normal Summoned this card this turn and have a face-up Level 7 or higher Aqua Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, all face-up Level 7 or higher Aqua Type monsters on your field gain 400 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Hilt, the Bearer of Noble Arms
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
1 Attack Position Warrior Type monster on your field gains 600 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Hitotsu-Me Giant (Rush Duel)
lore: A one-eyed behemoth with thick, powerful arms made for delivering punishing blows.

name: Hormone GunMcQueen, the Magnificent Shichirin
lore:
"Shichirin Samurai - Kushiro the Skewer Master" + "Taste Inspector"

[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 "Shichirin Samurai - Kushiro the Skewer Master" and/or "Taste Inspector" from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all face-up Level 9 or lower non-FIRE Attribute monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Horn Knives the Music Princess
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent a Warrior Type monster to the Graveyard by this effect, you can add 1 Warrior Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Hot Off the Press
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster on your field, send 1 EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Your opponent takes the bottom 5 cards of their Deck and shows them. Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of monsters among the shown cards] x 400. Your opponent places the shown cards on top of their Deck in any order.

name: Hot the Combustion Spirit
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Send cards from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard equal to [the number of different Types on your field]. Then, if you sent 2 or more Pyro Type monsters to the Graveyard by this effect, draw 1 card.

name: Howlingbird
lore: A bird that constantly emits sound as it flies with the wind. It is said the noise its wings make reflects the heart of the listener. To some it sounds like a beautiful song, but to others it's an ominous drone.

name: Hunter of Titans
lore:
"Descendant of Titans" + "Babysitter Goat"

[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 Fiend Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Hunting Strawberries
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a Spell/Trap Card on your field is destroyed by an opponent's card effect.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up monster with 1500 or less ATK on your opponent's field.

name: Hydro Cannon Big Bluefin
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Up to 2 face-up Fish Type monsters on your field with 1000 or less ATK can attack directly this turn.

name: Hydro Magician
lore: A young wizard who can communicate telepathically with water. His brilliant blue dance leaves his foes in awe.

name: Hyosube (Rush Duel)
lore: This amphibian is strong on the attack, but leaves much to be desired when defending.

name: Hyozanryu (Rush Duel)
lore: A dragon created from a massive diamond that sparkles with blinding light.

name: Hyper Assistant Achi
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a monster on their field, send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher Pyro Type monster from your hand face-up to your field. Then, if you have "Super Assistant Achi" in your Graveyard, the monster Special Summoned by this effect gains 800 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Hyper Engine Vast Vulcan
lore:
You can Maximum Summon this card together with "Hyper Engine Vast Vulcan [L]" and "Hyper Engine Vast Vulcan [R]".

[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

name: Hyper Engine Vast Vulcan [L]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 800 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can destroy a Field Spell Card on your opponent's field. Then, if you destroyed a Field Spell Card by this effect, inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

name: Hyper Engine Vast Vulcan [R]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on either side of the field loses ATK equal to [its Level] x 100 until the end of this turn. Then, inflict damage to your opponent equal to [that monster's Level] x 100.

name: Hyper Upstart King Rex
lore:
"Super King Rex" + "Ritzy King Rex"

[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 Dinosaur Type monster from your Graveyard on the top or bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 700 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have "Upstart Goblin" in your Graveyard, you can add 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Hypernova
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 2 face-up Level 7 non-LIGHT Attribute Dragon Type monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 LIGHT Attribute Dragon Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Hyperstrike Dragon Dragiastar F
lore:
"Multistrike Dragon Dragias" + "The Dragon"

[REQUIREMENT]
If all monsters in your Graveyard are High Dragon and/or Dragon Type monsters, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[MULTI-CHOICE EFFECT]
 This turn, this card gains 900 ATK, and it can make up to 2 attacks on monsters. This turn, this card can attack twice, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: I Hear Footsteps
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent draws for their normal draw in their Draw Phase while you have a face-up Zombie Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Look at your opponent's hand. You can choose up to 3 Spell/Trap Cards from their hand. If you do, your opponent Sets those cards to their field, and they take damage equal to [the number of cards Set by this effect] x 300.

name: Icarus Attack (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster, or after your opponent activates a Spell Card, send 1 face-up Winged Beast Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy up to 2 cards on your opponent's field.

name: Ice Age Catapult
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, place 1 WATER Attribute monster from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Return 1 Spell/Trap Card from your opponent's field to the owner's hand. Then, you can make 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field lose 600 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.

name: Ice Pop Bear
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "CAN:D" or "Ama Lilith" from your Graveyard face-up to your field. This turn, you can only attack with Omega Psychic or Psychic Type monsters.

name: Icezark the Unequaled
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 2 Level 7 or higher Warrior Type monsters with different names from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck in any order.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher Warrior Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Ichtyosterguard
lore: An Ichthyostega soldier with incredible toughness. Since it wears hard and heavy armor, it is quite slow moving.

name: Ignoring Insect
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster.
[EFFECT]
Change up to 3 Attack Position Insect Type monsters on your field to face-up Defense Position. Then, if you have 2 or more face-up Defense Position monsters on your field, you can change 1 Attack Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Defense Position.

name: Illusion Strike Dragon Miragias
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Level 7 or higher Dragon Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Up to 2 face-up Level 7 or lower monsters on your opponent's field lose 1500 ATK until the end of this turn. This turn, if this card destroyed a monster by battle, it can make a second attack on a monster during that Battle Phase.

name: Imaginary Actor
lore: A mechanical doll incapable of expressing emotions outside of laughing. It uses the emotions of its audience as energy.

name: Imaginary Arc Tower
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Activate this card if you have a LIGHT Attribute Normal Monster with 500 DEF in your Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up non-LIGHT Attribute monsters on the field lose 300 ATK, and face-up Level 9 LIGHT Attribute monsters on the field cannot be destroyed by Trap Card effects.

name: Imaginary Arc Turbo
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Level 9 LIGHT Attribute monster or 1 face-up LIGHT Attribute Normal Monster on your field gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have "Imaginary Actor" in your Graveyard, that monster gains 1000 more ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Imaginary Arc Turbulence
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster while you have a LIGHT Attribute Normal Monster with 500 DEF in your Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Attack Position Level 8 or higher LIGHT Attribute monster on your field to face-up Defense Position, then you can destroy 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field with the same Type as a Normal Monster in your Graveyard.

name: Imaginary Arc Turnback
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your Attack Position LIGHT Attribute monster is destroyed by an opponent's attack.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Cyborg Type monster or 1 LIGHT Attribute Normal Monster with 500 DEF from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Imptailing Crisis
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 600 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has 2 or more face-up Level 7 monsters on their field, you can shuffle 1 monster from your opponent's field into the Deck.

name: Indigo Prison
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster, send 1 monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This turn, neither player can Special Summon Level 7 or 8 monsters from the Graveyard.

name: Infernal Kappa Diwet
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle Level 7 Normal Monsters from your opponent's Graveyard into their Deck, up to [the number of Spell Cards in your opponent's Graveyard]. Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Kappa Emperor River Slider" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Inferno Fire Blast (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" face-up on your field.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 2400 damage to your opponent. Your "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" cannot attack this turn.

name: Infinite Constructor Wyrm Buildream
lore:
"Constructor Wyrm Buildragon" + "Constructor Princess Pylon"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your Field Zone to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 2 monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Innocent Lancer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
If this card attacks a Defense Position monster this turn, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Insect Rampage
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
All face-up Insect Type monsters on your field gain 300 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if your opponent has a face-up Insect Type monster on their field, you can destroy 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field.

name: Inside Out Roll
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 5 or higher Fairy Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn, then, if your opponent's LP are at least 2000 higher than yours, that monster loses 1500 more ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Insurrection Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 4 Normal Monsters from your Graveyard on the bottom of your Deck in any order.
[EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of monsters on the field] x 700 until the end of this turn. Once this turn, this card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

name: Intercepting Gaia
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster while you have a face-up Level 7 monster with 2100 DEF on your field.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field to face-down Defense Position. Then, if you have "Gaia the Dragon Champion" face-up on your field, you can destroy 1 face-down card on your opponent's field.

name: Interstellime
lore: A slime made out of interstellar matter gas. It has a faint lime scent. Iashigyuei!

name: Intrude Beetle
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If 2 or more face-up Insect Type monsters are on the field, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Invading Nature
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Plant Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Iris the Rare Shadow Flower
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Set 1 "Shadow Flower Sewing" or "Shadow Flower Duplication" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone. Then, send the bottom card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent a Level 5 Plant Type Normal Monster to the Graveyard by this effect, you can Special Summon 1 Plant Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Iron Onslaught
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Machine Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: It's Right Behind You!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent takes damage during the Draw Phase or Main Phase.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Dark Skeleton Dead Ruler" or "Wicked Shadow Dark Lurker" from your hand or your Graveyard face-up to your field. Switch the original ATK and DEF of the monster Special Summoned by this effect until the end of this turn.

name: JAM:P Check!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 2 or more face-up Psychic Type monsters on your field, including a Normal Monster.
[EFFECT]
Look at up to 2 face-down Spell/Trap Cards on your opponent's field, and destroy 1 of them. Then, if you have "CAN:D" face-up on your field, you can gain 1000 LP.

name: JAM:P Set!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 Level 2 or lower Psychic Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard on top of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Place 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster from your opponent's field on top of the owner's Deck. Then, if you placed "CAN:D" on top of the Deck to meet the requirement, you can shuffle up to 2 monsters from your opponent's Graveyard into their Deck.

name: JAM:P Start!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 2 Psychic Type monsters from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck in any order.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Psychic Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, if you added "CAN:D" to your hand by this effect, gain 1000 LP.

name: JAM:P Up!
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 face-up Psychic Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 Psychic Type monster from your hand face-up to your field. If you sent "CAN:D" to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, the monster Special Summoned by this effect gains 1500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Jarmalewe
lore: A violent entity that lives in the world of flames. Not even the bones of its prey are left behind.

name: Jasmine the Shadow Flower Festival
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Plant Type Normal Monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Defense Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Attack Position. Then, if the monster changed to face-up Attack Position by this effect was EARTH Attribute, you can draw 1 card.

name: Javelin Dux the Shadow Flower Piercer
lore:
"Gatling the Shadow Flower Shinobi" + "Lindo the Shadow Flower Warrior"

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field. Then, you can Set 1 "Shadow Flower Return" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Jet Barracuda
lore: This creature uses jet propulsion to charge in shocking speeds. Some wonder whether it even is a fish.

name: Jewelry Trap Hole
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster while you have 3 face-up Aqua Type monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field.

name: Jinzo (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
Neither player can activate Trap Cards, and all Trap Card effects are negated.

name: Joining Chairs
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a monster while you have 3 face-up monsters with 0 ATK on your field.
[EFFECT]
Change up to 2 monsters on your field to face-up Defense Position. This turn, if you have a Defense Position monster on your field, your opponent's monsters can only attack Defense Position monsters.

name: Jointech Ace
lore: An autonomous robot that excels at construction. Its joint parts hide an unknown power.

name: Jointech Arc Scorpio
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Machine Type monster from your hand or face-up from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 "Fusion" or "Power Bond" from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Jointech Spike Centipede" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Jointech Bumper
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack, shuffle 3 Machine Type Normal Monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Destroy up to 3 Attack Position monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Jointech Burst Dragon
lore:
"Jointech Rex" + "Blue Tooth Burst Dragon"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all face-up monsters with 2500 or less ATK on your opponent's field. Then, this card gains ATK equal to [the number of monsters destroyed by this effect] x 500 until the end of this turn. Then, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Jointech Cobra
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no other monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Jointech Arc Scorpio", "Jointech Spike Centipede", or "Jointech Rex" from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position. This turn, you cannot activate the effects of non-Machine Type monsters.

name: Jointech Dig Up
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck. Add 1 excavated card to your hand. Place the remaining cards on top of the Deck in any order, or send them to the Graveyard.

name: Jointech Fighter
lore:
"Jointech Ace" + "Jointech Ace"

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Take 1 Level 7 EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster from your Graveyard, and either add it to your hand or Special Summon it face-up to your field. Then, if it was "Jointech Hero", you can add 1 "Jointech Ace" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Jointech Great Wall
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a Level 7 or higher monster face-up while you have a face-up Level 7 or higher EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
This turn, up to 3 face-up EARTH Attribute Machine Type monsters on your field gain 300 ATK and cannot be destroyed by battle.

name: Jointech Hero
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card by Tributing "Jointech Ace", send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 1500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can add 1 EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Jointech Ignition
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your face-up EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster.
[EFFECT]
The attack target cannot be destroyed by that battle. Then, if you have a face-up Level 7 or higher EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster on your field, you can destroy the attacking monster.

name: Jointech Killer Stinger
lore:
"Jointech Arc Scorpio" + "Jointech Spike Centipede"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
All face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose ATK equal to [the number of monsters on your opponent's field] x 700 until the end of this turn. Then, you gain LP equal to [the number of monsters on your opponent's field] x 700.

name: Jointech Leo
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Choose 1 Spell/Trap Card in your opponent's Graveyard. Your opponent Sets that card on their field. Then, you can add 1 Level 7 or higher EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Jointech Raptor
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 2 cards of each player's Deck to the Graveyard, and inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of monsters sent to the Graveyard by this effect] x 100. Then, if you have a face-up Equip Spell Card on your field and you inflicted damage to your opponent by this effect, you can change 1 Attack Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Defense Position.

name: Jointech Rex
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, shuffle 3 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Jointech Rushhorn
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up Machine Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains 300 ATK, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Jointech Spike Centipede
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Return 1 other face-up Level 5 or higher EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster from your field to the owner's hand.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field. This turn, you cannot activate the effects of non-Machine Type monsters.

name: Jointech Stegosilos
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send up to 3 EARTH Attribute Machine Type monsters from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy face-up monsters with 1600 or less DEF on your opponent's field equal to [the number of monsters sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement].

name: Jointech Tinplatesaurus
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Attack Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Defense Position. Then, that monster loses 2000 DEF until the end of this turn.

name: Jointech Tossceratops
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
This card is in Attack Position.
[EFFECT]
Toss a coin. If the result is heads, this turn, this card gains 1500 ATK and your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards when it declares an attack. If the result is tails, change this card to face-up Defense Position.

name: Judgment of the Rising Light
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Shuffle 1 monster from either Graveyard into the Deck. Then, if your opponent has no cards in their hand, you can return 1 face-up monster from your opponent's field to the owner's hand.

name: Jurassic Oasis
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Activate this card by sending the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard while you have a face-up Dinosaur Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up Dinosaur Type monsters on the field cannot be destroyed by monster effects.

name: Jurassic World (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up Dinosaur Type monsters on the field gain 300 ATK/DEF.

name: Kaibaman (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand face-up to your field.

name: Kamaleon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Pay 300 LP.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if a Reptile Type Normal Monster(s) is among the cards sent, add 1 Reptile Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand. You can only attack with Reptile Type monsters the turn you activated this effect.

name: Kanan the Security Guard
lore: A lady warrior whose main battlefield is a prison island. Armed with sword and shield, she rebukes harshly. She has a great reputation of bringing recidivists back to their senses.

name: Kanan the Sword Diva
lore: A swordswoman who leads the vanguard in the entertainment district. Even in full makeup, she always carries her sword and shield. Friends with Bubbly Elf.

name: Kanan the Swordmaiden
lore: A lady swordmaster whose main battlefield is the theater club. Armed with a sword and shield, she floats like a butterfly and dances like a bee.

name: Kappa Avenger (Rush Duel)
lore: An amphibian that sold his soul for unlimited power to avenge his late friend.

name: Kappa Emperor River Slider
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 face-up Aqua Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy up to 2 face-up Level 7 or lower Normal Monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Kappa Rapper
lore: A Kappa whose sick rhymes cause people to approach the water's edge.

name: Kappa's Gas
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your face-down monster.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 2000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Kappa's River Flow
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack, shuffle 2 Aqua Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 800 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can make 1 face-up Normal Monster on your opponent's field lose 800 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Karatake the Talismanic Warrior
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have another face-up Warrior Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of Spell/Trap Cards on their field] x 200.

name: Karchizark the Unequaled
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Level 7 or higher monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you sent a Warrior or Winged Beast Type monster to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, you can add 1 Level 6 or lower Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Kataomoiruka
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 "Umi" or "Big Umi" from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card.

name: Kengo Shogun of the Crescent Moon
lore:
"Masaki the Legendary Samurai" + "Hero of the Yeast"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This turn, this card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

[REQUIREMENT]
Send your entire hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of cards sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement] x 600 until the end of this turn.

name: Keytar Kid
lore: The youngest member of the band, she's often teased by Romic n' Roller, but everyone recognizes her talents. She dreams of the day she'll play on stage with her bandmates as a quintet.

name: Kimeluna the Dark Shifter
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Change the battle positions of up to 2 monsters on your opponent's field (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position). Then, if you changed a battle position by this effect, you can change the battle position of 1 face-up monster on your field.

name: Kimeruler the Dark Raider
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has no Attack Position monsters on their field during the turn you Normal Summoned this card, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This turn, this card can attack directly, also you can only attack with Warrior Type monsters.

lore:
"Kimeluna the Dark Shifter" + "Needlkyrie the Celestial Seamstress"

[REQUIREMENT]
None

 Add 1 monster with 0 ATK from your Graveyard to your hand. Destroy up to 2 Defense Position monsters on your opponent's field.

name: King's Majesty
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack, shuffle 1 Level 1 Fiend Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.

[REQUIREMENT]

[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Level 6 or lower monster on your opponent's field. If you do, your opponent draws 1 card. You cannot attack directly this turn.

[EFFECT]
Add 2 or 3 Fiend Type Normal Monsters with different Levels from your Graveyard to your hand.

[REQUIREMENT]
Send 3 face-up Level 1 Galaxy Type monsters from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field.

name: Kudzu the Bruised Shadow Flower
lore: An extremely shy flower spirit. Her sweet sigh is invigorating.

name: Kumamon
lore: The Sales and Happiness Manager of Kumamoto Prefecture. His job is to help people across the country find surprises and happiness all around them.TV Tokyo's corporate banana, Nanana, can't hide their shock and surprise at Kumamon's happy aura.2010kumamoto pref.kumamon

name: Kuribot
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have no other monsters on your field, pay 500 LP.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 "Kuribot" from your Graveyard to your hand.

lore:
"Kuribot" + "Siesta Torero"

[EFFECT]
Return 1 Defense Position monster from your opponent's field to the owner's hand.

name: Kuripotriple
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 3 "Kuribot" from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Draw 2 cards.

name: Kurobana the Shadow Flower Wolf
lore: A group of grass ninjas who protect their lord from crises, while concealed in the shadow. Even if they are struck down, they strike back from the shadows of blades of grass.

name: Kuzuha the Talismanic Supreme Sage
lore:
"Shitotsu the Talismanic Warrior" + "Miginagi the Talismanic Warrior"

[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 Spell/Trap Card from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
All face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose ATK equal to [the number of monsters with 1000 ATK and DEF in your Graveyard] x 300 until the end of this turn.

name: Labyrinth Tank (Rush Duel)
lore: "Giga-Tech Wolf" + "Cannon Soldier"

name: LaMoon (Rush Duel)
lore: A sorcerer that draws its powers from the lunar landscape.

name: LaMoon the Party Princess
lore: A sorceress that has escaped dull, everyday life. She uses lunar magic to captivate affluent men. Besties with Kanan the Sword Diva.

name: Landporter MAX
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Send 1 monster from your field to the Graveyard. Then, you can add 1 EARTH Attribute Machine Type Maximum Monster from your Graveyard to your hand. If you do, toss a coin twice. If the result is 2 heads, draw 1 card.

[REQUIREMENT]

[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field. Then, if you destroyed a Spellcaster Type monster by this effect, you can destroy all monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Lauan Adventurers
lore: Adventurers who seek unknown land. They originally competed to see how far they could fly, but at some point they began to travel together.

name: Laughing Grass
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a monster.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Plant Type monster from your hand face-up to your field. Then, if you Special Summoned a Normal Monster by this effect, you can Special Summon up to 2 Level 1 Plant Type Normal Monsters from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Legend Magician
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]

None

This card cannot attack directly. This card gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up Dragon Type monsters on your opponent's field] x 500.

name: Lesser Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore: A minor dragon incapable of breathing fire.

Draw 1 card.

name: Lindo the Shadow Flower Warrior
lore: A group of grass ninjas who secretly support the path to victory while concealing themselves in the shadows. They continue to loyally serve their lord.

name: Little D (Rush Duel)
lore: Yo, this tyrannosaurus tot's got a terrible temper.

name: Lizard Soldier (Rush Duel)

name: Lost Cat

When an opponent's monster declares an attack.

Your opponent declares a card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) and sends the top card of their Deck to the Graveyard. If it was not the declared card type, negate the attack, and inflict 300 damage to the opponent.

None

This card's name becomes "Soleil the Skysavior Angel" this turn. Then, send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can add 1 "Fusion" from among the cards sent to the Graveyard by this effect to your hand.

name: Lucky Mask of Omens
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Warrior Type monster on your field gains ATK equal to [its Level] x 100 until the end of this turn.

Change 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field to face-down Defense Position.

name: Mach Mega Falcon
lore:
"Cyber Falcon" + "Cyber Falcon"

None
[EFFECT]
Gain 500 LP. Then, if you gained LP by this effect, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

None

[REQUIREMENT]

[EFFECT]
Add 1 Level 4 Spellcaster Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Magical Beast Wolfang
lore: The former familiar of a well-known magician. At some point its magical power surpassed that of its master, and it now toys with its foes by manipulating flames at will.

name: Magical Ghost (Rush Duel)
lore: This creature casts a spell of terror and confusion just before attacking its enemies.

name: Magical Lance - Grace Spear
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up Magical Knight or Spellcaster Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains 200 ATK, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference). If the equipped monster is Magical Knight Type, it gains additional ATK equal to [its Level] x 200.

lore: Mememelody Cattle Meetimeetion! Meeeg-chan is the princess of the Ewekai Ranch. When she eats delicious paper or important letters, she can't help but let out a "Not baaaaad~"!

None

[REQUIREMENT]

None

name: Man-Thro' Tro' (Rush Duel)

name: Masaki the Legendary Samurai

None

This card gains ATK equal to [the number of DARK Attribute Spellcaster Type monsters with different names in your Graveyard] x 300. lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Level 7 or higher EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Printing Presser" from your Graveyard face-up to your field. This turn, the monster Special Summoned by this effect cannot attack directly.

name: Requesting 9
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your monster is destroyed by an opponent's attack.
[EFFECT]
Gain 900 LP. Then, if you have 9 or more FIRE Attribute monsters in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 "Player #39: Home Run Hitter" or "Player #99: Grand Slam Dragon" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Reset Runner
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle your Deck.

name: Resurrection of the Blaze Fiends
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your FIRE Attribute Maximum Monster is destroyed by an opponent's attack, pay 600 LP.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon up to 2 Level 4 or lower FIRE Attribute Maximum Monsters from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Return (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent adds a card from the Graveyard to the hand.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle 1 random card from your opponent's hand into the Deck.

name: Return of the Blaze Fiends
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Return up to 2 face-up Fiend Type Maximum Monsters from your field to the owner's hand. This turn, you can only attack with Maximum Monsters.

name: Revenge MAX
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster face-up.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your field. Then, if you destroyed an Equip Spell Card by this effect, you can destroy 1 of those Normal or Special Summoned Level 8 or lower monsters.

name: Rhythmical Performer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Your opponent sends the top card of their Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if they sent a Spell/Trap Card to the Graveyard by this effect, you can draw 1 card.

name: Rice Terrace Crisis
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Special Summons a monster from the hand or Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change up to 2 face-up monsters on your opponent's field to face-down Defense Position, whose total Levels equal 12 or less.

name: Rice Terrace Ripple
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if your opponent has a card in their Spell & Trap Zone, you can change 1 face-up Normal Monster on your opponent's field to face-down Defense Position.

name: Rice Terrace Secure
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Level 5 or higher monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change non-Aqua Type Attack Position monsters on your opponent's field to face-up Defense Position, up to [the number of face-up Aqua Type monsters on your field].

name: Righteous Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 Dragon Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
This turn, this face-up card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a Dragon Type monster in Attack Position.

name: Rightful Magic
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 2 or more face-up monsters with the same Attribute on your field.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 600 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Ring of Storms
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle 2-7 monsters with different names from your opponent's Graveyard into their Deck. Then, if you shuffled 6 or more monsters by this effect, you can shuffle 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster from your opponent's field into the owner's Deck.

name: Rising Light Angel Esser
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During a turn you have not Special Summoned a monster.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you activated this effect during the first turn of the second player, you can Special Summon 1 monster from either Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Rising Luna Radiant Luster
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a Celestial Warrior Type Fusion Monster or "Kimeluna the Dark Shifter" face-up on your field, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 card on your opponent's field.

name: Rising Soldier
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can choose 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field. If you do, during your opponent's next turn, they cannot attack with that monster.

name: Ritzy King Rex
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has no cards in their hand.
[EFFECT]
Each player draws 1 card, then, if both players drew by this effect, you can Set 1 "Upstart Goblin" from your Graveyard to your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Road Arms - Sevens Lance
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have no other face-up "Road Arms - Sevens Lance" on your field, equip this card to 1 face-up "Sevens Road Magician" on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains ATK equal to [the number of different Attributes in your Graveyard] x 400 and cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

name: Road Arms - Sword Breaker
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have no other face-up "Road Arms - Sword Breaker" on your field, equip this card to 1 face-up "Sevens Road Magician" on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains ATK equal to [the number of equipped Equip Spell Cards on the field] x 1000 and cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

name: Road Magic - Dark Night
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Spellcaster Type monster on your field, send 1 DARK Attribute monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field.

name: Road Magic - Explosion
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Spellcaster Type monster on your field, send 1 FIRE Attribute monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of cards on their field] x 400.

name: Road Magic - Flowback
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Spellcaster Type monster on your field, send 1 WATER Attribute monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Return 1 monster from your opponent's field to the owner's hand.

name: Road Magic - Tectonic Shift
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Spellcaster Type monster on your field, send 1 EARTH Attribute monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses ATK equal to [the ATK of the monster with the highest ATK in your Graveyard] until the end of this turn.

name: Road Magic - Tempest
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Spellcaster Type monster on your field, send 1 WIND Attribute monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change the battle position of up to 3 monsters on your opponent's field (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position).

name: Road Magic - Uplifter
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Spellcaster Type monster on your field, send 1 LIGHT Attribute monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your field gains ATK equal to [the ATK of the face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field with the lowest ATK] until the end of this turn.

name: Robbarim
lore: A curious apprentice adventurer. She often works with Prophecy Phrase's gang in search of the treasures of their ancestors.

name: Rocketortoise Modularchelon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send up to 2 other face-up Reptile Type monsters from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of monsters sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement] x 700 until the end of this turn.

name: Rogue of Archfiend
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 face-up Fiend Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Up to 2 face-up Fiend Type monsters on your field cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects this turn.

name: Rolled Hot Arrow
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 500 damage to your opponent, then, if you have a face-up Fairy Type monster on your field, you can Special Summon 1 Fairy Type monster from your hand to your field face-up.

name: Rolled Sticky Save
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
1 Attack Position Fairy Type monster on your field cannot be destroyed by battle this turn. Your opponent gains LP equal to [that monster's ATK].

name: Romanpick
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your LP are lower than your opponent's, pay 500 LP.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. If a Psychic Type monster(s) is among the cards sent, add 1 Psychic Type monster from the Graveyard to your hand.

name: Romic n' Roller
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your LP are 2000 or lower.
[EFFECT]
All face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose 500 ATK and DEF until the end of this turn.

name: Rose Chain Salvage
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Special Summons a monster while you have a Level 6 or higher Spellcaster Type monster on your field equipped with an Equip Spell Card.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, gain LP equal to [the original Level of the monster Special Summoned by this effect] x 100.

name: Royal Rebel's Arena
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Activate this card if your opponent has 2 or more monsters on their field.
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up LIGHT Attribute Fiend Type monsters on the field cannot be destroyed by Trap Card effects.

name: Royal Rebel's Blues
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, send 1 Spell/Trap Card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher Fiend Type monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position. You can only attack with Fiend Type monsters this turn.

name: Royal Rebel's Break
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has a face-up Level 8 or higher monster on their field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher Fiend Type Normal Monster from your hand to your field in face-up Defense Position. Increase this card's Level by 5 until the end of this turn.

name: Royal Rebel's Command
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Fiend Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up LIGHT Attribute Fiend Type monster on your field gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn, then you can change its battle position (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position).

name: Royal Rebel's Doom Metal
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card by Tributing 2 Level 7 or higher Fiend Type monsters.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all face-up monsters on your opponent's field, then inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the total original Levels of the monsters destroyed by this effect] x 100.

name: Royal Rebel's Echo
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 or lower Fiend Type monster with 0 DEF from your hand or your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, if you Special Summoned a Level 7 monster by this effect, you can add 1 Fiend Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Royal Rebel's Fanatic
lore: A girl who has trouble making eye contact when talking with others. She seeks friends and true love.

name: Royal Rebel's Growl
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card by Tributing a Level 5 or higher monster, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field loses ATK/DEF equal to [its Level] x 200 until the end of this turn.

name: Royal Rebel's Hard Rock
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card by Tributing 2 Level 7 or higher Fiend Type monsters.
[EFFECT]
Choose 1 face-up Level 7 or higher monster on your opponent's field. Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the difference in ATK between the chosen monster and this card]. This card gains ATK equal to [the chosen monster's ATK] until the end of this turn.

name: Royal Rebel's Heavy Metal
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card by Tributing a Level 5 or higher monster.
[EFFECT]
Choose 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster with the lowest Level on your opponent's field, and this card gains ATK equal to [that monster's ATK] until the end of this turn. Destroy that monster.

name: Royal Rebel's Invasion
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card by Tributing 2 Level 5 or higher monsters.
[EFFECT]
Destroy all face-up Level 4 or lower monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Royal Rebel's No Wave
lore: A bizarre demonic devil who serves the King. It absorbs every sound and repels every attack.

name: Royal Rebel's Phaser
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Fiend Type monster on your field, send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher Fiend Type monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position.

name: Royal Rebel's Rocker
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Level 6 or higher Fiend Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand. You cannot attack directly this turn.

name: Royal Rebel's Shout
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a face-up Level 7 or higher monster on their field, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Send up to 2 random cards from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard.

name: Ruler's Current
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Warrior Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Warrior Type monster with 2000 or more DEF on your field gains ATK equal to [its original DEF] until the end of this turn.

name: Ruler's Dance
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a Level 7 or higher Attack Position Warrior Type monster(s) on your field is destroyed by an opponent's attack or their Trap Card effect.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Yamiruler the Dark Delayer", "Kimeruler the Dark Raider", or "Semeruler the Dark Summoner" from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position.

name: Ruler's Deadly Duel
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack on your face-up Warrior Type monster.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 400 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have a face-up Level 8 or higher Warrior Type monster on your field, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Ruthless Slash - Megaplunder
lore: A ferocious plunderer that hunts under the cover of the moonlit night. Its razor sharp claws slice through its enemies!

name: Sacred Arms - Strabishop
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Equip this card to 1 face-up Psychic Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
The equipped monster gains 100 ATK and 1500 DEF, also it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

name: Sacrificial Summon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 face-up monster with 1600 or more ATK from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Effect Monster from your hand face-up to your field. If you sent an Effect Monster whose original Level is 7 or higher to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, the monster Special Summoned by this effect can make up to 2 attacks on monsters this turn.

name: Sakakaze the Talismanic Warrior
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Warrior Type monster other than this card on your field.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle monsters from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck, up to [the number of Spell/Trap Cards on your opponent's field].

name: Sakuretsu Armor (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
Destroy the attacking monster.

name: Sakuretsu Force
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack, shuffle 3 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have "Sakuretsu Armor" in your Graveyard, you can destroy up to 2 Attack Position monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Salary Slash
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's Level 8 or lower monster declares an attack on your face-up monster, pay 600 LP.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 400 ATK until the end of this turn. Monsters cannot be destroyed by that battle.

name: Salvage Wolfish
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During your Main Phase that you Normal or Special Summoned this card, place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 WATER Attribute Sea Serpent Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, if you added "U.M.U. - Unidentified Mysterious Urchin" to your hand by this effect, this card gains 1400 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Samba Zombie Rio
lore: A zombie that constantly shuffles around awkwardly. It has no sense of self left, but it hasn't forgotten the rhythm of the samba that seeped into its body.

name: Samurai of the Wooden Sword
lore:
"Masaki the Legendary Samurai" + "Centennial Wooden Blade"

[REQUIREMENT]
During your Main Phase that you Special Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Destroy 1 face-up Normal Monster on your opponent's field. Then, if you destroyed a monster by this effect, you can add 1 "Climax Clash" or "Engage and Strike!" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Sannomiya Golden G Robo MK-III
lore: Its power source is AA Batteries. Its daily routine is to watch videos while taking a walk. It never works or studies.

name: Sansetsukontra the Music Fiend
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 10 or more cards in your Deck and no other monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if your opponent has a face-up monster with 3000 or more ATK on their field, you can draw 3 cards.

name: Satellite Pegasus
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you have 1 or less monsters in your Graveyard, you can destroy 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field.

name: Satellite Soldier
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Increase the Level of 1 face-up Level 6 or lower monster on your field with 1000 DEF by 2 until the end of this turn.

name: Savage Claw Tiger
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up Level 7 or higher monsters on your field] x 400 until the end of this turn.

name: Scales of Flame
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 1 Pyro Type monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up Pyro Type monster on your field gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can make 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field lose 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Scarechair Bone
lore: One of the earliest organic chairs said to be made by a family of artisans. Has a distinctive feel when sat upon.

name: Scarechair Gear
lore: A mechanical chair that is easy to mass produce. It is not as comfortable to sit in as the organic chairs from before.

name: Scarechair Relaxer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 monster with 0 ATK from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if a Level 8 or lower DARK Attribute monster(s) is among the cards sent, add 1 Level 8 or lower DARK Attribute monster from your Graveyard to your hand. Your opponent gains LP equal to [that monster's ATK].

name: Scarechair Saber
lore: A masterpiece organic chair made by a family of artisans at the peak of their craft. Extremely comfortable.

name: Scarechair Scale
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have no other monsters on your field, place 2 monsters with 0 ATK from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck in any order.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher monster with 0 ATK from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Attack Position.

name: Scaredy Cats
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster face-up and you have a face-up Beast Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 1000 ATK until the end of this turn, then you can Special Summon 1 Level 1 Beast Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your field face-up.

name: Scoop Scooter
lore: Delivers the morning edition before breakfast! Also delivers the evening edition before breakfast!

name: Screw Armadillo
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Machine Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Attack Position Level 6 or lower monster on your opponent's field to face-down Defense Position.

name: Scroll of Salutation
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal Summons a monster while you have 2 or more face-up Level 5 or higher monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Return 1 monster from your field to the owner's hand, also you can change all Attack Position monsters on your field to face-up Defense Position.

name: Scrubbing Santa Cloth
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During your Main Phase that you Normal Summoned or Special Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Your opponent draws cards equal to [the number of monsters on their field]. Then, you gain LP equal to [the number of cards they drew by this effect] x 300.

name: Sea Dragon Cranedross
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a monster on their field, place 1 "Sea Dragon King Granganus" or 1 "Grand Extreme" from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Fish or Sea Serpent Type monster from your hand face-up to your field. This turn, you can only attack with WATER Attribute monsters.

name: Sea Dragon King Granganus
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of Spell/Trap Cards on your opponent's field] x 300.

name: Sea Dragon Knight
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Look at 1 face-down Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field. Then, if your opponent has a card with the same name as that card in their Graveyard, you can destroy it.

name: Sea Star Trooper
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle 1 monster from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck. Then, if you have "Umi" or "Big Umi" face-up on your field, you can send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

name: Seahorse Carrier
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 LIGHT Attribute Aqua Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Seahorse Server
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up LIGHT Attribute Aqua Type Normal Monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Gain 500 LP.

name: Seal of the Ancients (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Pay 1000 LP.
[EFFECT]
Look at all face-down cards on your opponent's field, then return them to their original positions.

name: Seastorm of Iruqua
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack while you have "Umi" or "Big Umi" face-up on your field.
[EFFECT]
Change the battle positions of all face-up monsters on your opponent's field (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position). Then, you can Special Summon 1 Sea Serpent Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Secret File 33 - Noble Death of Resentment
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack, shuffle 3 Level 3 or higher Reptile Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 3000 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Secret Investigator Miscast
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have no other monsters on your field, pay 300 LP.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if a Reptile Type monster(s) is among the cards sent, you can add 1 LIGHT Attribute Reptile Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Secret Investigator Mislead
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have another face-up Reptile Type monster on your field, pay 300 LP.
[EFFECT]
Change 1 face-down Defense Position monster on either side of the field to face-up Attack Position. Then, this card loses 1300 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Secret Investigator Mismatch
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a face-up Level 7 or higher monster on their field, send 1 Level 3 or lower Reptile Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 Reptile Type monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Attack Position.

name: Secret Investigator Mistake
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During your Main Phase this card was Normal or Special Summoned.
[EFFECT]
Excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck. You can add 1 excavated Level 3 or higher Reptile Type monster to your hand. Place the remaining cards on the top of the Deck in any order.

name: Secret Order
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 7 Normal Monster from your hand or Graveyard face-up to your field. This turn, the monster Special Summoned by this effect gains 700 ATK, and cannot be destroyed by an opponent's Trap Card effects.

name: Security Hole
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's Level 8 or lower monster declares an attack while you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Cyberse Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle the attacking monster into the Deck.

name: Seedchrotron Brusselun
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if a Cyberse Type monster was sent to the Graveyard by this effect, you can add Cyberse Type monsters with 0 DEF from your Graveyard to your hand, up to [the number of face-up monsters on your opponent's field].

name: Seir the Skysavior Knight
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, reveal 1 "Skysavior Prayer" or "Fusion" in your hand.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card.

name: Semeruler the Dark Summoner
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 monster with 0 ATK from your hand face-up to your field. It gains ATK equal to [its original DEF] until the end of this turn.

name: Semeterasu the Celestial Summoner
lore:
"Semeruler the Dark Summoner" + "Needlkyrie the Celestial Seamstress"

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[MULTI-CHOICE EFFECT]

Special Summon 1 "Sportsdragon Slugger" from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position. This turn, your Level 6 and lower monsters cannot attack.

name: Sportsdragon Slugger
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no other monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 "Sportsdragon Pitcher" from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position. This turn, your Level 6 and lower monsters cannot attack.

name: Sportsdragon Striker
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have "Sportsdragon Keeper" on your field in Attack Position, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This turn, 1 face-up monster on your field gains 400 ATK, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Spy Observation
lore:

You have 2 or more face-up Reptile Type monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Excavate the top card of your Deck. Then, place the excavated card on either the top or bottom of your Deck. Then, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Spyturtle
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Reduce the Level of 1 face-up Level 3-8 monster on your opponent's field by 2 until the end of this turn.

name: SSD Drake
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a monster on their field, send 1 Spell/Trap Card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 2 Level 4 or lower Dragon Type Normal Monsters from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position.

name: Star Cat Destronya
lore:
"Cat Claw Girl" + "Golden-Eyes Star Cat"

[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 monsters with 200 DEF from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 2 monsters with 200 DEF and the same Level from your Graveyard face-up to your field. If you Special Summoned Normal Monsters by this effect, those Normal Monsters gain 2200 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Star Cat Straynya
lore:
"Cat Claw Girl" + "Silver-Eyes Star Cat"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 other card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 2200 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn. Then, if you sent a Normal Monster with 200 original DEF to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Star Replacer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have no other monsters on your field, return this card from your field to the owner's hand.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-down Defense Position. For the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters from your hand or Graveyard.

name: Star Restart
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 5 or lower Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, you can add 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Star Trancer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Galaxy Type monster from your hand face-up to your field. Then, if you Special Summoned a Level 8 monster by this effect, this turn, it gains 400 ATK, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Star Tri-Leo
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have no other monsters on your field during the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck. Send all excavated Galaxy Type monsters to the Graveyard. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: Stardom Light
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 face-up Normal Monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Psychic Type monster from your hand face-up to your field. Then, if you sent a Level 2 or lower monster to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, gain 1000 LP.

name: Startup Goblin
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 6 or lower monster from your hand to your field face-up. The monster Special Summoned by this effect gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have "Upstart Goblin" in your Graveyard, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

name: Steel Mech Lord Mirror Innovator
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Choose up to 3 monsters in your Graveyard with the same Type as this card. This card gains ATK equal to [the total Levels of those monsters] x 100 until the end of this turn. Then, shuffle those monsters into the Deck. If you shuffled exactly 1 monster by this effect, this card inflicts piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference), if it attacks a Defense Position monster this turn.

name: Steel Soldier Gale Vinary
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Toss a coin. If the result is heads, all face-up monsters on your field gain 500 ATK until the end of this turn. If the result is tails, you can make 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field lose 800 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.

name: Steel Steed Martin Vinary
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Toss a coin a number of times equal to [the number of face-up monsters on your opponent's field]. If at least 1 of the results is heads, this card can attack twice this turn. Then, if 3 of the results are heads, this card inflicts piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference), if it attacks a Defense Position monster this turn.

name: Steel Strike Dragon Metagias
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 Level 7 or higher Dragon Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This turn, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or your opponent's Trap Card effects, also it can make a second attack on a monster during the Battle Phase in which it attacked a monster.

name: Stemagic
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, if you sent a Spell Card to the Graveyard to meet the requirement and your LP are 1000 or lower, draw 1 additional card.

name: Stock Buster Dragon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has 5 or more cards on their field, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
All face-up Level 7 or lower monsters on your opponent's field lose 1500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Stock the Noodle Ninja
lore: A ninja who prides himself on being al dente. He constantly trains himself to reach the hardness of steel wire. He isn't great with water techniques.

name: Stone Dragon (Rush Duel)
lore: A dragon formed by huge boulders that are also used to attack the enemy.

name: Stop Defense (Rush Duel)
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Change 1 Defense Position monster on your opponent's field to face-up Attack Position.

name: Storm Sonic
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 2 or more face-up WIND Attribute monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 600 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn. Then, if you have a face-up "Cyber-Tech Alligator" on your field, you can destroy 1 card on your opponent's field.

name: Stormbolt Destroyer
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has 2 or less cards in their hand.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Thunder Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Straight Pierce
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 5 WIND Attribute Warrior Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
This turn, 1 face-up Level 7 or 8 monster on your field gains 2000 ATK, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Strange Seas
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Special Summon up to 3 Level 4 or lower WATER Attribute monsters from your hand face-up to your field. Then, if you have 3 face-up WATER Attribute monsters on your field, you can draw 1 card.

name: Strange Traveler
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Galaxy Type Normal Monster on your field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Strange Wall
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you have a Galaxy Type monster in your Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Stray Force
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 200 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have 3 face-up Beast, Beast-Warrior, and/or Warrior Type monsters with 200 DEF on your field, you can destroy all Attack Position monsters on your opponent's field.

name: Straynge Cat
lore: A familiar said to hold great powers. It doesn't like being alone, and is very lonely now that it's been separated from its friends.

name: Straynge Cats
lore:
"Straynge Cat" + "Straynge Cat"

[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Spellcaster Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, if you Special Summoned "Straynge Cat" by this effect, this card gains 1400 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Stream
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]

lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a monster in your Graveyard, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of different Attributes in your Graveyard] x 200, until the end of this turn. Then, if your opponent's LP are 700 or less, inflict 700,000,000 damage to your opponent.

name: Stud Hedgepeg
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent a monster to the Graveyard by this effect, you can make 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field lose 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

lore:
"Steel Strike Dragon Metagias" + "The Dragon"

Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

 All face-up monsters on your field gain 500 ATK until the end of this turn, also this card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters this turn. All face-up monsters on your field cannot be destroyed by battle or your opponent's Trap Card effects until the end of this turn, also this card can attack twice this turn.

name: Summoned Skull (Rush Duel)
lore: A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy. Among the Fiend Type monsters, this monster boasts considerable force.

name: Sunbathing Kappa
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a Level 5 or higher monster face-up.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Aqua Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-down Defense Position.

name: Sunny Fairy Spinangel
lore: An angel that's totally bringing the bling in the modern style. Nobody be stoppin' him, man.

name: Sunny Forest

None
[EFFECT]
While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up Defense Position Insect Type monsters on the field cannot be destroyed by card effects.

Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

This card gains 600 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if this card is in Maximum Mode, it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects until the end of your opponent's next turn.

[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 monster from your hand to the Graveyard.

lore:

Maximum Mode
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

This card gains ATK equal to [the Level of 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field] x 200 until the end of this turn.
