Maximum Mode: Send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon up to 2 monsters from your hand face-up to your field, then you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Supreme Skystream Magnum Overlord [L]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode: Shuffle 1 monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the Level of 1 monster in your Graveyard] x 100. Then, you can add that monster to your hand.

name: Supreme Skystream Magnum Overlord [R]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
This card loses 1000 ATK until the end of this turn. This turn, this card cannot attack directly, it can attack all your opponent's monsters once each, also it inflicts piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

name: Supreme Wildgleam Magnum Overlord
lore:
You can Maximum Summon this card together with "Supreme Wildgleam Magnum Overlord [L]" and "Supreme Wildgleam Magnum Overlord [R]".

[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

name: Supreme Wildgleam Magnum Overlord [L]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
This card gains ATK equal to [the number of monsters on your opponent's field] x 500. If you have 10 or more monsters in your Graveyard, this card inflicts piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference), if it attacks a Defense Position monster.

name: Supreme Wildgleam Magnum Overlord [R]
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Maximum Mode
[CONTINUOUS EFFECT]
During the turn your opponent Special Summoned a Level 5 or higher monster face-up, while this card is face-up, your opponent cannot activate the effects of face-up Level 10 or lower monsters.

name: Surge Bolt Lizard
lore: An electric lifeform that appears with lightning strikes. It can transform itself into an electric current that invades circuitry, causing machinery to fail.

name: Surge Vortex Dragoon
lore:
"Surge Bolt Lizard" + "Surge Bolt Lizard"

[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has a face-up monster on their field.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 "Electrical Discharge" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Surprising Zomvictory
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have 2 or more face-up Zombie Type Normal Monsters on your field.
[EFFECT]
Change the battle positions of up to 3 monsters on your opponent's field. Then, you can make all face-up Zombie Type monsters on your field gain ATK equal to [the number of Zombie Type Normal Monsters in your Graveyard] x 100 until the end of this turn.

name: Survival Swordfish
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have a face-up Level 7 Fish Type monster on your field, place 1 Fish Type monster from your Graveyard on the bottom of your Deck.
[EFFECT]
Up to 2 face-up Fish Type monsters on your field gain 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Swapinning Silkworm Fibellon
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If you have another face-up Insect Type monster on your field, send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field becomes Insect Type this turn.

name: Sword & Shield
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's Level 9 or lower monster declares an attack targeting your Attack Position monster.
[EFFECT]
Switch the original ATK and DEF of the attacking monster until the end of this turn. Switch the original ATK and DEF of the attack target until the end of this turn. Then, you can add 1 "Shield & Sword" from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Sword Dancer
lore: A master swordsman that used to serve a great nation. He controls his flying swords with great precision as the audience watches attentively.

name: Sword Skill - Ruler's Slash
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a Spell/Trap Card on their field, shuffle 1 Level 8 Warrior Type monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster with 2500 or more ATK and 2500 or more DEF on your field gains 2500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field. This turn, you can only attack with 1 monster.

name: Swordfish Vanguard Gaju
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Set 1 "Dolphin Counterattack" or "Seastorm of Iruqua" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone. Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Dolphin King Iruqua" from your hand or your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Swordsman of Roadstar
lore: A swordsman of the shooting stars with unknown powers, capable of carving open a miraculous path.

name: Sylphidra
lore: A dragon whelp of the four great Element Dragons, it commands the winds. It manipulates the atmosphere as it desires, using this power to protect the land.

name: Tag-Up-Magic Sacrifice Force
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 face-up FIRE Attribute monster from your field to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Level 8 FIRE Attribute monster from your hand face-up to your field. Then, if you sent a Level 8 monster to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.

name: Taiban Bluemai
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has 4 or less cards in their hand and you have 2 face-up non-Level 3 Psychic Type monsters on your field during the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Shuffle 2 monsters from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck. Then, your opponent draws until they have 5 cards in their hand.

name: Takegumi the Ruler's Squad
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent has a monster on their field and you have a monster with 0 ATK in your Graveyard, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your field gains ATK equal to [the number of monsters with 0 ATK in your Graveyard] x 200 until the end of this turn.

name: Takriminos (Rush Duel)
lore: A member of a race of sea serpents that freely travels through the sea.

name: Talismanic Seal Array
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 4 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses ATK equal to [its Level] x 200 until the end of this turn.

name: Tama the Mancer Cat
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have another face-up monster with 0 ATK on your field.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. If a monster(s) with 0 ATK is among the cards sent, you can Special Summon 1 Normal Monster with 0 ATK from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: Tamabot
lore: A Tamabot that just happened to be summoned. As soon as it appears, it's time for a fight!

name: Tamabot Burst Dragon
lore:
"Blue Tooth Burst Dragon" + "Tamabot"

[REQUIREMENT]
Send cards from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard equal to [the total number of "Tamabot" in both players' Graveyards].
[EFFECT]
This card gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you sent a monster with 1500 or less ATK to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, you can destroy 1 face-up monster with 1500 or more ATK on your opponent's field.

name: Tang the Noodle Ninja
lore: A ninja who is proud of his chewy noodles and their unique texture. Those bound by his soup-infused noodles cannot escape.

name: Taste Inspector
lore: A pro taste tester who is experienced in the ways of the world, knowing its bitterness and sweetness. No matter what kind of dish it is, she can season it to perfection.

name: Telepathic Agent
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If your opponent's LP are at least 1000 higher than yours, shuffle 1 Psychic Type monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
This card can attack directly this turn.

name: Temporary Storm Blockade
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When a card is sent from your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can shuffle 1 random card from your opponent's hand into the Deck.

name: Terrorphone Number
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When your opponent draws for their normal draw in their Draw Phase while you have a Zombie Type monster in your Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Inflict 900 damage to your opponent. This turn, if your opponent attacks a face-up monster, they can only attack the monster on your field with the lowest Level.

name: Terrorsaur Sternptera
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
None
[EFFECT]
Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard, then you can place 1 random card from your opponent's hand on the bottom of the Deck.

name: Thantsgiving
lore: Ants who always give thanks to their comrades for their support. They're determined to further increase the number of their allies.

name: The All-Seeing White Tiger (Rush Duel)
lore: A proud ruler of the jungle that some fear and others respect.

name: The Barrier
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's monster declares an attack, shuffle 1 monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
The attacking monster loses 400 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: The Clone
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
If the only monsters in your Graveyard are High Dragon and/or Dragon Type monsters, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Draw 1 card. Then, if you have "The Copy" or "Back To The Fusion" in your Graveyard, this card's name becomes "The Dragias" this turn.

name: The Copy
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Your opponent has a face-up Level 7 or higher monster on their field.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 Normal Monster with the same name as a face-up monster on your field, from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: The Creator (Rush Duel)
lore:
This card cannot be Special Summoned from the Graveyard.

[REQUIREMENT]
You have a card in your hand.
[EFFECT]
Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

name: The Cursed Cat Counting Dishes
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
When an opponent's Level 9 or lower monster declares an attack while you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Zombie Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
Negate the attack.

name: The Dragias
lore: A dragon that made seven supernovae go gamma-ray burst. Its name is... The Dragias! The Dragias!!

name: The Dragiastar
lore:
"The Dragias" + "The Dragias"

[REQUIREMENT]
If you have 2 or more Normal Monsters with the same name in your Graveyard, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[MULTI-CHOICE EFFECT]
 2 Attack Position monsters with the same name on your field can attack twice this turn. Special Summon 2 Normal Monsters with the same name from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

name: The Dragon
lore: The dragon of justice signaling supernova clashes! Its name is The Dragon!

name: The Fire Dragon
lore: A very beautiful dragon covered with FIRE. It does not like fights, but has incredibly high attack power.

name: The Half-Body Crawling Around
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.
[EFFECT]
Add 1 Zombie Type Normal Monster with 0 ATK from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: The Menacing Eyes of the Sky Emperor
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
Send 1 monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
[EFFECT]
Change the battle position of 1 monster on your opponent's field (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position). Then, if you have a face-up Level 10 monster on your field, you can draw 1 card.

name: The Noodle Art of Roastery
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
You have a face-up Level 7 or higher Pyro Type monster on your field.
[EFFECT]
All face-up Pyro Type monsters on your field gain ATK equal to [the number of Normal Monsters in both players' Graveyards] x 100 until the end of this turn.

name: The Noodle Art of Saucery
lore:
[REQUIREMENT]
